original: de yang rnam pa gsum ste /

analyzed: @3a * // 'dod chags dang 'dod chags dang bral ba ni bde ba'i dus dang sdug bsngal gyi dus so //

analyzed: de dag gis spangs pa'i dus ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus de /

analyzed: de ltar ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas bdag gis thos kyi /

original: yang so so'i skye bo nyid kyi dus kyi dbye ba dang / bsam pa dang / the tshom mang bas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yang so so'i skye bo nyid kyi dus kyi dbye ba dang / bsam pa dang / the tshom mang bas ni ma yin no //

analyzed: yang gsungs pa /

analyzed: dus ni bsam gyis mi khyab dus //

original: gcig ni lhan cig med pa yin //
analyzed: gcig ni lhan cig med pa yin //

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni ston pa dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa ste bha ga'i sbyor ba'i phyir ;
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni ston pa dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa ste bha ga'i sbyor ba'i phyir ;
translated: The Blessed One is the teacher, the glorious Vajra Holder, because of the union with the bhaga.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: He is called the Blessed One.

original: bha ga ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: bha ga ni rnam pa gnyis te /

original: dbang phyug la sogs pa yon tan drug gi bha ga dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa dgra'i dpung 'joms pa'i bha ga ste /
analyzed: dbang phyug la sogs pa yon tan drug gi bha ga dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa dgra'i dpung 'joms pa'i bha ga ste /

original: 'di gnyis 'di la mnga' ba'i phyir de skad ces brjod do //
analyzed: 'di gnyis 'di la mnga' ba'i phyir de skad ces brjod do //

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The essence of the body, speech, and mind of all tathƒÅgatas

original: de rnams nyid kyi mchog nyid kyi phyir snying po rnams te /
analyzed: de rnams nyid kyi mchog nyid kyi phyir snying po rnams te /
translated: are the essences because they are the best of those.

original: snying po ni mchog ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: snying po ni mchog ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //

original: rdo rje ni mi phyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje ni mi phyed pa'i phyir ro //

original: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje la sogs pa de rnams kyi snying po'i mchog ste /
analyzed: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje la sogs pa de rnams kyi snying po'i mchog ste /
translated: Or else, the essence of the body vajra, etc. of all tathƒÅgatas is the best.

original: rgyur gyur pa rgyal ba drug pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: rgyur gyur pa rgyal ba drug pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //

original: rdo rje 'dzin ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa ste /
translated: The vajra-holders are the vajra body, etc.

original: de rnams kyi ni rdo rje 'dzin pa drug po rnams kyi ste rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga po rnams kyi btsun mo rnams so //

translated: The bhaga of those vajra-holders is the bhaga of the six vajra-holders, the consorts of the five Tathagatas such as Vairochana.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po /
translated: The bhaga of the vajra-consorts is the bhaga of the vajra-consorts, the essence of the body, speech, and mind of all Tathagatas.

original: rdo rje'i btsun mo rnams ni spyan la sogs pa bzhi po rnams dang / phyag rgya lnga pa bdag med ma ste /
analyzed: rdo rje'i btsun mo rnams ni spyan la sogs pa bzhi po rnams dang / phyag rgya lnga pa bdag med ma ste /

original: de rnams kyi bha ga ni khyim rnams so //
analyzed: de rnams kyi bha ga ni khyim rnams so //

original: yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang gsungs pa /
translated: It is also said:

original: gang la gtso bo spyod gyur pa'i //
analyzed: gang la gtso bo spyod gyur pa'i //

original: khyim ni bha ga zhes su gsungs //
analyzed: khyim ni bha ga zhes su gsungs //
translated: is said to be the bhaga.

original: ji srid lus ni rnam gnas pa /
analyzed: ji srid lus ni rnam gnas pa /
translated: As long as the body remains,

original: de yis las dang las min 'gyur //
analyzed: de yis las dang las min 'gyur //
translated: it is karma and non-karma.

original: zhes so // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rdo rje'i btsun mo'i bha ga de rnams la bzhugs pa ni rnam par spyad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes so // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rdo rje'i btsun mo'i bha ga de rnams la bzhugs pa ni rnam par spyad pa'o //
translated: The abode of all the Tathagatas' body, speech, and mind, the bhaga of the Vajra Queen, is the enjoyment.

original: de ltar gnas su bzhugs pa ni //
analyzed: de ltar gnas su bzhugs pa ni //
translated: Thus, the abode is

original: rdo rje snying po stan las langs te /
analyzed: rdo rje snying po stan las langs te /
translated: the Vajra Essence, who arose from his seat,

original: bla gos phrag @3b pa gcig du gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te /
analyzed: bla gos phrag @3b pa gcig du gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te /
translated: put his upper robe over one shoulder, knelt on his right knee,

original: thal mo sbyar ba byas nas /
analyzed: thal mo sbyar ba byas nas /
translated: put his palms together,

original: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: and said this to the Blessed One:

original: ye shes kyi dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rje btsun gsang ba'i yang shin tu ches gsang ba'i gleng gzhi'i tshig gsungs pa nyan par 'tshal na sku ni gang gsung ni gang thugs ni ci lags /
analyzed: ye shes kyi dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rje btsun gsang ba'i yang shin tu ches gsang ba'i gleng gzhi'i tshig gsungs pa nyan par 'tshal na sku ni gang gsung ni gang thugs ni ci lags /
translated: I wish to hear the words of the introduction to the essence of the body, speech, and mind of all the Tathagatas, the extremely secret of the secret of the venerable one, the lord of wisdom. What is the body? What is the speech? What is the mind?

original: de nyid gsang ba gsum po 'di rnams kyi yang snying po shin tu ches gsang ba de gang lags /
analyzed: de nyid gsang ba gsum po 'di rnams kyi yang snying po shin tu ches gsang ba de gang lags /
translated: What is the extremely secret essence of these three secrets?

original: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad par rigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad par rigs so //
translated: Therefore, it is fitting that the Lord should explain.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Lord said:

original: ae ma'o rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ae ma'o rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Emaho vajra essence!

original: ae ma'o zhes bya ba'i tshig gi phrad ni ngo mtshar ba la bya'o //
analyzed: ae ma'o zhes bya ba'i tshig gi phrad ni ngo mtshar ba la bya'o //
translated: The word emaho is used for wonderment.

original: rdo rje snying po rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i 'khor rnams kyi de kho na 'di spyod yul ma yin pa zhu ba legs so legs so //
analyzed: rdo rje snying po rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i 'khor rnams kyi de kho na 'di spyod yul ma yin pa zhu ba legs so legs so //
translated: This reality of the eighty million lords of yoga with vajra essence is not the domain of experience of those who ask, good, good!

original: zhes bya ba 'di ni mdzes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di ni mdzes pa'o //
translated: This is the beauty of it.

original: 'dod pa de bshad par bya yis nyon cig / rdo rje sems dpa' ni sku ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa de bshad par bya yis nyon cig / rdo rje sems dpa' ni sku ste /
translated: Listen, I will explain that desire. Vajrasattva is the body,

original: he ru ka phyag gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: he ru ka phyag gnyis pa'o //
translated: Heruka is the two-armed one.

original: sems dpa' chen po ni gsung ste phyag bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po ni gsung ste phyag bzhi pa'o //
translated: Mahasattva is the speech, the four-armed one.

original: dam tshig sems dpa' ni thugs te phyag drug pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig sems dpa' ni thugs te phyag drug pa'o //
translated: Samayasattva is the mind, the six-armed one.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' dang / sems dpa' chen po dang / dam tshig sems dpa' dang / de'i snying po kye'o rdo rje zhes bya ba 'bras bu rdo rje 'dzin nyon cig / sku dang gsung dang thugs ni rab tu grub bo //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' dang / sems dpa' chen po dang / dam tshig sems dpa' dang / de'i snying po kye'o rdo rje zhes bya ba 'bras bu rdo rje 'dzin nyon cig / sku dang gsung dang thugs ni rab tu grub bo //
translated: The result is the vajra holder.

original: de rnams kyis mtshan gzhan gyi yon tan gyi khyad par shes par 'dod pas zhus pa /
analyzed: de rnams kyis mtshan gzhan gyi yon tan gyi khyad par shes par 'dod pas zhus pa /
translated: Those who wish to know the other names and special qualities of those [vajras] ask,

original: gang phyir rdo rje sems dpa' lags //
analyzed: gang phyir rdo rje sems dpa' lags //
translated: ‚ÄúWhy is it Vajrasattva?‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: and so forth.

original: de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: To that, the Blessed One replies,

original: rdo rje mi phyed ces bya ba la sogs pa ni //
analyzed: rdo rje mi phyed ces bya ba la sogs pa ni //
translated: ‚ÄúVajra is indivisible,‚Äù and so forth.

original: rang bzhin dang bral ba'i phyir gzugs brnyan la sogs pa lta bur mi phyed pa ni rdo rje'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin dang bral ba'i phyir gzugs brnyan la sogs pa lta bur mi phyed pa ni rdo rje'o //
translated: Since it is free from intrinsic nature, it is indivisible like a reflection and so forth. It is the vajra.

original: gnyis su med pa'i ngo bos dngos po thams cad snyoms pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i ngo bos dngos po thams cad snyoms pa'i phyir /
translated: Since it is equal to all things by being nondual in nature,

original: sems dpa' ni gcig pa nyid do //
analyzed: sems dpa' ni gcig pa nyid do //
translated: it is the single being.

original: zhes tshig rkang gnyis kyis sku rdo rje ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes tshig rkang gnyis kyis sku rdo rje ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhes gsungs so //
translated: With these two lines, it is said that the vajra body is Vajrasattva.

original: ye shes rnams kyang yin la /
analyzed: ye shes rnams kyang yin la /
translated: They are the great intuitions,

original: chen po rnams kyang yin pa de rnams ni ye shes chen po rnams te /
analyzed: chen po rnams kyang yin pa de rnams ni ye shes chen po rnams te /
translated: and they are the great tastes.

original: me long lta bu la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: me long lta bu la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The great intuitions are the mirror-like intuition, etc.

original: de'i rang bzhin gyi phyir ye shes chen po'i sgras ni sangs rgyas lnga ru gsungs so //üîΩro ni kha ba dang / skyur ba dang / tsha ba dang / bska ba dang / @4a * //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin gyi phyir ye shes chen po'i sgras ni sangs rgyas lnga ru gsungs so // ro ni kha ba dang / skyur ba dang / tsha ba dang / bska ba dang / @4a * //
translated: The five Buddhas are said to be the great intuitions, because they are their nature.üîΩThe tastes are the tastes of the six sense-objects, sweet, sour, bitter, astringent,

original: lan tshva dang / mngar ba rnams so //
analyzed: lan tshva dang / mngar ba rnams so //
translated: saline, and pungent.

original: ye shes chen po rnams kyang yin la /
analyzed: ye shes chen po rnams kyang yin la /
translated: They are the great intuitions,

original: ro rnams kyang yin pa de rnams ni ye shes chen po'i ro rnams so //
analyzed: ro rnams kyang yin pa de rnams ni ye shes chen po'i ro rnams so //
translated: and they are the tastes.

original: de'i gnas kyi phyir de rnams kyis gang ba ni gsung gi rdo rje ste /
analyzed: de'i gnas kyi phyir de rnams kyis gang ba ni gsung gi rdo rje ste /
translated: The one who is filled with them is Vajra Speech, because he is their abode.

original: sems dpa' chen po zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po zhes gsungs so //
translated: He is the great hero.

original: ro'i rang bzhin de nyid dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshigs bcad 'di la dpyad par bya ste /üîΩkha ba tsha ba rdo rjer dbul //
analyzed: ro'i rang bzhin de nyid dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshigs bcad 'di la dpyad par bya ste / kha ba tsha ba rdo rjer dbul //
translated: The nature of the tastes and the verses of the Buddhas should be analyzed in this way:üîΩThe bitter is the vajra of the hot,

original: mngar ba rdo rje rtag pa la //
analyzed: mngar ba rdo rje rtag pa la //
translated: and the sweet is the vajra of the permanent.

original: skyur ba rdo rje nyi ma la //
analyzed: skyur ba rdo rje nyi ma la //
translated: The sour is the vajra sun.

original: de bzhin lan tshva 'jig rten rjer //
analyzed: de bzhin lan tshva 'jig rten rjer //
translated: Likewise, the salty is the lord of the world.

original: rta yi rgyal po thams cad dam //
analyzed: rta yi rgyal po thams cad dam //
translated: The bitter is the king of all horses.

original: bska ba rab tu brtag par bya //
analyzed: bska ba rab tu brtag par bya //
translated: The astringent is to be thoroughly examined.

original: zhes so // dam tshig ni bskyang bar bya ba nyid de /
analyzed: zhes so // dam tshig ni bskyang bar bya ba nyid de /
translated: The commitments are to be guarded.

original: de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: They are also of two kinds:

original: bsrung bar bya ba dang / bza' bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsrung bar bya ba dang / bza' bar bya ba'o //
translated: those to be guarded and those to be consumed.

original: de las bsrung bar bya ba ni bzhi nyid de /
analyzed: de las bsrung bar bya ba ni bzhi nyid de /
translated: Of those, the commitments to be guarded are fourfold.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: rang rang gi yul la rnam par shes pa lnga'i lus bsrung ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig rnams dang / phung po lnga dul ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig rnams dang / khams bzhi 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig rnams dang / rang dang gzhan gyi don gyi rgyur gyur pa zhes bya ba'i byang chub kyi sems 'dris par byed pa dang goms pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ste /
analyzed: rang rang gi yul la rnam par shes pa lnga'i lus bsrung ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig rnams dang / phung po lnga dul ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig rnams dang / khams bzhi 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig rnams dang / rang dang gzhan gyi don gyi rgyur gyur pa zhes bya ba'i byang chub kyi sems 'dris par byed pa dang goms pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ste /
translated: The commitments called ‚Äúguarding the body of the five consciousnesses in their own objects,‚Äù the commitments called ‚Äútaming the five aggregates,‚Äù the commitments called ‚Äúthe gathering of the four elements,‚Äù and the commitments called ‚Äúthe familiarization and cultivation of the bodhicitta that is the cause of one‚Äôs own and others‚Äô aims.‚Äù

original: 'di ni bsrung bar bya ba'i dam tshig go //
analyzed: 'di ni bsrung bar bya ba'i dam tshig go //
translated: These are the commitments to be guarded.

original: 'dris par bya ba'i dam tshig kyang bcud kyis len pa lnga po rnams te /
analyzed: 'dris par bya ba'i dam tshig kyang bcud kyis len pa lnga po rnams te /
translated: The pledge of acquaintance is the five nectars.

original: de rnams thams cad la spyad pa ni /
analyzed: de rnams thams cad la spyad pa ni /
translated: The practice of all of them is

original: dam tshig la spyad pa ste /
analyzed: dam tshig la spyad pa ste /
translated: the practice of the pledge.

original: de'i dngos po ni dam tshig la spyad pa nyid de /
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni dam tshig la spyad pa nyid de /
translated: The reality of that is the practice of the pledge itself.

original: de'i phyir dam tshig la spyad pa nyid kyi rgyu'i phyir thugs kyi rdo rje ni dam tshig sems dpa' zhes bshad do //
analyzed: de'i phyir dam tshig la spyad pa nyid kyi rgyu'i phyir thugs kyi rdo rje ni dam tshig sems dpa' zhes bshad do //
translated: Therefore, because of being the cause of the practice of the pledge, the mind vajra is explained as the pledge being.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i sku la sogs pa lta bur rab tu grub pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i sku la sogs pa lta bur rab tu grub pa de'i phyir /
translated: Because of being well-established like the body of Vajrasattva, and so on,

original: ji ltar 'dir kye'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i mtshan gyi rgyu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: ji ltar 'dir kye'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i mtshan gyi rgyu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to realize the cause of the name ‚ÄúHevajra,‚ÄùüîΩit is said:

original: he yi rnam pas ci zhig bshad //
analyzed: he yi rnam pas ci zhig bshad //
translated: What is explained by the form of ‚Äúhe‚Äù?

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te go sla'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te go sla'o //
translated: and so on, which is easy to understand.

original: de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: There, the Blessed One said:

original: hes ni snying rje chen po nyid //
analyzed: hes ni snying rje chen po nyid //
translated: ‚ÄúHe‚Äù is the nature of great compassion.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa ni sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa ni sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and so on, because of being impartial toward all sentient beings.

original: nyi tshe ba las che ba'i phyir snying rje chen po ni sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa'o //
analyzed: nyi tshe ba las che ba'i phyir snying rje chen po ni sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa'o //
translated: Since it is greater than limited compassion, great compassion is the complete protection of all sentient beings.

original: 'ang zhes bya ba ni yang gi don to //
analyzed: 'ang zhes bya ba ni yang gi don to //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù has the meaning of ‚Äúand.‚Äù

original: hes ni re zhig snying rje gsungs na /
analyzed: hes ni re zhig snying rje gsungs na /
translated: Since compassion has been mentioned,

original: badzra yis kyang ci gsungs she na /
analyzed: badzra yis kyang ci gsungs she na /
translated: what has been said by Vajra?

original: badzra shes rab brjod par bya //üîΩzhes gsungs te /
analyzed: badzra shes rab brjod par bya // zhes gsungs te /
translated: Vajra is said to be wisdom.

original: nges pa rnyed pa'i phyir the tshom zlog pa ni shes rab ste /
analyzed: nges pa rnyed pa'i phyir the tshom zlog pa ni shes rab ste /
translated: Wisdom is the reversal of doubt because of the attainment of certainty.

original: rdo rjes brjod par @4b 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rjes brjod par @4b 'gyur ro //
translated: It is said to be Vajra.

original: ci 'di dag yang snying rje dang / shes rab dag gis sku gsum dmigs par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: ci 'di dag yang snying rje dang / shes rab dag gis sku gsum dmigs par 'gyur zhing /
translated: How is it that these, compassion and wisdom, are the observation of the three bodies,

original: de dmigs pa'i phyir ji ltar de'i snying por 'gyur ba'i rigs de'i phyir bdag nyid can gyi kye'o rdo rje yang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dmigs pa'i phyir ji ltar de'i snying por 'gyur ba'i rigs de'i phyir bdag nyid can gyi kye'o rdo rje yang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and because of the observation of those, how is it that the essence of that is reasonable? Therefore, the self-nature of ‚ÄúO Vajra‚Äù is also not established.

original: 'di'i phyir snying po kye'i rdo rje zhes bya ba yang nyon cig / ces bya ba yang 'thad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di'i phyir snying po kye'i rdo rje zhes bya ba yang nyon cig / ces bya ba yang 'thad pa ma yin te /
translated: For this reason, it is not reasonable to say ‚ÄúListen to the essence, O Vajra.‚Äù

original: sku gsum las steng du sangs rgyas kyang yod pa ma yin zhing /
analyzed: sku gsum las steng du sangs rgyas kyang yod pa ma yin zhing /
translated: But even though Buddhahood is not above the three bodies,

original: 'on kyang sku gsum 'dus pa nyid sangs rgyas su 'dod do //
analyzed: 'on kyang sku gsum 'dus pa nyid sangs rgyas su 'dod do //
translated: nevertheless, the very union of the three bodies is asserted to be Buddhahood.

original: de bzhin du yang dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las /
translated: And so it is said in the glorious Guhyasamaja:

original: sku gsung thugs ni rnam pa gsum //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs ni rnam pa gsum //
translated: The three bodies, speech, and mind

original: gsang ba zhes ni mngon par brjod //
analyzed: gsang ba zhes ni mngon par brjod //
translated: are called the secret.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad ces bya ba //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad ces bya ba //
translated: The so-called all buddhas

original: tshogs pa 'dus par gsungs pa nyid //
analyzed: tshogs pa 'dus par gsungs pa nyid //
translated: are said to be the assembled gathering.

original: ce'o // de ltar ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ce'o // de ltar ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not like that.

original: sku gsum bsdu ba'i phyir /
analyzed: sku gsum bsdu ba'i phyir /
translated: Because the three bodies are included,

original: der thabs kyi yan lag 'di 'ba' zhig gsungs kyi /
analyzed: der thabs kyi yan lag 'di 'ba' zhig gsungs kyi /
translated: only this branch of method is taught there.

original: yang shes rab kyi yan lag ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yang shes rab kyi yan lag ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not the branch of wisdom.

original: 'dir yang thabs dang shes rab ldan zhing dmigs pa med pa'i phyir sku gsum las 'das pa shes rab kyi yan lag gi snying po gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dir yang thabs dang shes rab ldan zhing dmigs pa med pa'i phyir sku gsum las 'das pa shes rab kyi yan lag gi snying po gsungs so //
translated: And here, because of the union of method and wisdom and the absence of reference, the branch of wisdom that transcends the three bodies is taught, the essence of wisdom.

original: de bas na de'i yan lag pa gnyis bstan pa kye'i rdo rje nyon cig ces bya ba ni mdzes pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na de'i yan lag pa gnyis bstan pa kye'i rdo rje nyon cig ces bya ba ni mdzes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the teaching of its two branches is beautiful, with the words ‚ÄúListen, Hevajra!‚Äù

original: de bzhin du yang bshad pa'i rgyud du snying rje dang shes rab dag gi dmigs pa med pa nyid yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang bshad pa'i rgyud du snying rje dang shes rab dag gi dmigs pa med pa nyid yang gsungs pa /
translated: Likewise, the explanatory tantra teaches the non-objectification of compassion and wisdom:

original: spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin nyid //
analyzed: spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin nyid //
translated: The nature of non-elaboration

original: shes rab ces ni yongs su grags //üîΩyid bzhin nor ltar ma lus pa'i //
analyzed: shes rab ces ni yongs su grags // yid bzhin nor ltar ma lus pa'i //
translated: is renowned as ‚Äúwisdom.‚ÄùüîΩCompassion accomplishes the aims of all beings,

original: sems can don mdzad snying rje nyid //
analyzed: sems can don mdzad snying rje nyid //
translated: like a wish-fulfilling gem.üîΩWisdom and great compassion,

original: dmigs med gnas su shes rab dang // dmigs med snying rje chen po ni //
analyzed: dmigs med gnas su shes rab dang // dmigs med snying rje chen po ni //
translated: which are non-objectifying,

original: blo dang lhan cig gcig gyur pa //
analyzed: blo dang lhan cig gcig gyur pa //
translated: become one with the mind.

original: nam mkhar nam mkha' ji lta ba //
analyzed: nam mkhar nam mkha' ji lta ba //
translated: Like space in space,

original: zhe'o // de nyid thabs ni rgyu dang thun mong ma yin par /
analyzed: zhe'o // de nyid thabs ni rgyu dang thun mong ma yin par /
translated: That method is the cause and the common ground.

original: thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid rgyud //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid rgyud //
translated: The tantra of the nature of method and wisdom

original: de ni nga yis bshad kyis nyon //üîΩzhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de ni nga yis bshad kyis nyon // zhes gsungs te /
translated: is taught by me, so listen!

original: rgyud ces bya ba ni rjod par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rgyud ces bya ba ni rjod par byed pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúTantra‚Äù is that which expresses.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni kye'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i snying po zhes bya ba ste brjod par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni kye'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i snying po zhes bya ba ste brjod par bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù is the essence called ‚ÄúHevajra,‚Äù that which is to be expressed.

original: da yis bshad kyis zhes bya ba ni byed pa'i drug pa ste //
analyzed: da yis bshad kyis zhes bya ba ni byed pa'i drug pa ste //
translated: Now, the sixth case ending in de≈õayƒÅmi means I will explain.

original: bdag gis bshad do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bdag gis bshad do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is I will explain.

original: rgyud ni brjod par bya ba la sgra'i tshogs zhes bya ba 'dis ston par byed pa dang / rtogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rgyud ni brjod par bya ba la sgra'i tshogs zhes bya ba 'dis ston par byed pa dang / rtogs par byed pa'o //
translated: The tantra is the object of expression, and this is indicated by the term aggregate of words.

original: de yang rjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de yang rjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is the means of expression and the object of expression.

original: yang 'brel pa ni 'di dag gnyis kyi nyams su myong ba lhan cig 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: yang 'brel pa ni 'di dag gnyis kyi nyams su myong ba lhan cig 'byung ba'o //
translated: Moreover, the connection between these two is the simultaneous experience.

original: rgyud 'dir skye bo gus pa ni re zhig @5a * //
analyzed: rgyud 'dir skye bo gus pa ni re zhig @5a * //
translated: In this tantra, respect for beings is the purpose.

original: dgos pa'o // sangs rgyas nyid dang dngos grub brgyad po rnams ni dgos pa'i yang dgos pa'o //
analyzed: dgos pa'o // sangs rgyas nyid dang dngos grub brgyad po rnams ni dgos pa'i yang dgos pa'o //
translated: Buddhahood and the eight accomplishments are the ultimate purpose.

original: de la he ru ka ni bskyed pa'i rgyu /
analyzed: de la he ru ka ni bskyed pa'i rgyu /
translated: In this regard, Heruka is the cause of generation.

original: dang po re zhig gcig yin no //
analyzed: dang po re zhig gcig yin no //
translated: At the beginning, there is only one.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
translated: In this way,

original: re zhig dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i thabs gsungs te /
analyzed: re zhig dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i thabs gsungs te /
translated: he first teaches the method with reference to the object.

original: he ru ka bskyed pa'i rgyu ni he ru ka 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu ni rtsa'i 'khor lo ste /
analyzed: he ru ka bskyed pa'i rgyu ni he ru ka 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu ni rtsa'i 'khor lo ste /
translated: The cause of the generation of Heruka is the cause of the perfection of the arising of Heruka, which is the wheel of channels.

original: de de ltar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de de ltar 'gyur ro //
translated: That is the way it is.

original: phyis ni 'bras bu kye'i rdo rje zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyis ni 'bras bu kye'i rdo rje zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Later, the result is called ‚ÄúHevajra.‚Äù

original: grol bar 'dod pa'i srid pa la zhe sdang ba rnams kyi he ru ka bskyed pa'i rgyu dang / he ru kas kyang ci zhig bya //
analyzed: grol bar 'dod pa'i srid pa la zhe sdang ba rnams kyi he ru ka bskyed pa'i rgyu dang / he ru kas kyang ci zhig bya //
translated: For those who hate existence, desiring liberation, what is the cause of the generation of Heruka, and what is the use of Heruka?

original: zhes dogs pa la /üîΩdngos po nyid kyis rnam grol zhing //
analyzed: zhes dogs pa la / dngos po nyid kyis rnam grol zhing //
translated: With regard to that doubt,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: it is said, ‚ÄúLiberated by the very thing itself,‚Äù and so on.

original: 'byung ba'i phyir dngos po ste /
analyzed: 'byung ba'i phyir dngos po ste /
translated: Because of arising, it is a thing.

original: phung po de khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: phung po de khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'o //
translated: The aggregates are the elements, the sense bases, and so on.

original: de nyid kyi phyir dngos po nyid kyis rnam par grol bar 'gyur gyi yang phung po la sogs pa dang dngos po med pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir dngos po nyid kyis rnam par grol bar 'gyur gyi yang phung po la sogs pa dang dngos po med pas ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, one is liberated by the very thing itself, and not by the nonthing that is the aggregates, and so on.

original: gal te dngos po nyid kyis rnam par grol bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te dngos po nyid kyis rnam par grol bar 'gyur na /
translated: If one is liberated by the very thing itself,

original: de'i tshe sems can rnams kyang gang gis grol //
analyzed: de'i tshe sems can rnams kyang gang gis grol //
translated: then by what are sentient beings liberated?

original: gang gis 'ching bar 'gyur zhes dogs pa la //
analyzed: gang gis 'ching bar 'gyur zhes dogs pa la //
translated: In response to the doubt, ‚ÄúBy what is one bound? ‚Äù

original: dngos po'i 'ching bas 'ching bar 'gyur //
analyzed: dngos po'i 'ching bas 'ching bar 'gyur //
translated: ‚ÄúOne is bound by the bonds of entities. ‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: And so on.

original: dngos po'i 'ching bas ni dngos por mngon par zhen pa ste /
analyzed: dngos po'i 'ching bas ni dngos por mngon par zhen pa ste /
translated: The bonds of entities are the adherence to entities.

original: ji ltar gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i shes pa des 'ching bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji ltar gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i shes pa des 'ching bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By that consciousness which apprehends the grasped and the grasper, one is bound.

original: gal te dngos po'i 'ching bas 'ching bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te dngos po'i 'ching bas 'ching bar 'gyur na /
translated: If one is bound by the bonds of entities,üîΩthen at that time, being bound, one would not be liberated.

original: de'i tshe bcings pa nyid kyis grol bar mi 'gyur ro zhes dogs pa la /üîΩde yongs shes pas grol bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de'i tshe bcings pa nyid kyis grol bar mi 'gyur ro zhes dogs pa la / de yongs shes pas grol bar 'gyur //
translated: In response to this doubt, it is said:

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: ‚ÄúBy fully understanding that, one is liberated. ‚Äù

original: de yongs shes pa ni de'i yongs su shes pa ste /
analyzed: de yongs shes pa ni de'i yongs su shes pa ste /
translated: Fully understanding that is the full understanding of that.

original: dngos po yongs su shes pa'i phyir de yongs su shes pa zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: dngos po yongs su shes pa'i phyir de yongs su shes pa zhes gsungs so //
translated: Because of the full understanding of entities, it is said that ‚Äúby fully understanding that, one is liberated. ‚ÄùüîΩIf it is like that, then how is that fully understood?

original: gal te de ltar de'i phyir ji ltar de yongs su shes pa yin zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: gal te de ltar de'i phyir ji ltar de yongs su shes pa yin zhes dogs pa la /
translated: In response to this doubt, it is said:

original: dngos po bsgom gyur shes rab can //
analyzed: dngos po bsgom gyur shes rab can //
translated: ‚ÄúThe wise one meditates on entities. ‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: And so on.

original: shes rab can zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: shes rab can zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The one who is called ‚Äúwise‚Äù

original: rdo rje snying po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje snying po'o //
translated: is the essence of the vajra.

original: dngos po bsgom pa ni dngos po yongs su shes pa don du gnyer bas yongs su shes pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dngos po bsgom pa ni dngos po yongs su shes pa don du gnyer bas yongs su shes pa'i phyir /
translated: The meditation on entities is the meditation on the non-existence of entities, because of the desire for the thorough knowledge of entities.

original: chos dang don la bye brag phyed pa'i shes rab kyis bsgom par bya ba'i dngos po zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: chos dang don la bye brag phyed pa'i shes rab kyis bsgom par bya ba'i dngos po zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúthe entity to be meditated on‚Äù is the thorough knowledge of entities by means of the wisdom that distinguishes phenomena and their meaning.

original: gal te des cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te des cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If one asks, ‚ÄúWhat is the result of that?‚Äù

original: dngos po med pa nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: [The root text] declares, ‚ÄúThe non-existence of entities, etc.‚Äù

original: de bas na dngos po med pa yang bsgom par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de bas na dngos po med pa yang bsgom par 'gyur gyi /
translated: Therefore, the non-existence of entities is also meditation,

original: @5b dngos po 'ba' zhig ni ma yin no //
analyzed: @5b dngos po 'ba' zhig ni ma yin no //
translated: but not just entities alone.

original: de'i phyir / de nyid dngos po yongs su shes pa ste //
analyzed: de'i phyir / de nyid dngos po yongs su shes pa ste //
translated: Therefore, that is the thorough knowledge of entities.

original: 'on kyang gcig dang dum dang bral ba'i phyir rang bzhin med pas dngos po'i dngos po med par rab tu shes so //
analyzed: 'on kyang gcig dang dum dang bral ba'i phyir rang bzhin med pas dngos po'i dngos po med par rab tu shes so //
translated: However, because of the absence of intrinsic nature due to the absence of one and many, one thoroughly knows the non-existence of the entity of entities.

original: gal te de ltar dngos po'i dngos po med pa yongs su shes na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar dngos po'i dngos po med pa yongs su shes na /
translated: If one thoroughly knows the non-existence of the entity of entities in that way,

original: de'i tshe dngos po med pa nyid mchog ste cung zad bsgom pa mchog na dngos po bsgom zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: de'i tshe dngos po med pa nyid mchog ste cung zad bsgom pa mchog na dngos po bsgom zhes dogs pa la /
translated: At that time, the supreme non-entity, the supreme slight meditation, is the meditation on entity.

original: bshad pa'i rgyud du gsungs pas dris pa'i lan gdab pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: bshad pa'i rgyud du gsungs pas dris pa'i lan gdab pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: In order to answer the question, it is said:

original: lta ba rnams las log rnams dang // bdag tu lta ba tshol rnams kyi //
analyzed: lta ba rnams las log rnams dang // bdag tu lta ba tshol rnams kyi //
translated: For those who are mistaken about views, and for those who seek the view of self,

original: bdag zhen bsam pa bzlog don du //
analyzed: bdag zhen bsam pa bzlog don du //
translated: the thought of clinging to self is to be reversed.

original: ston pa rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs //
analyzed: ston pa rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs //
translated: The Victorious Teachers have said,

original: gal te stong pa thabs yin na //
analyzed: gal te stong pa thabs yin na //
translated: If emptiness is the method,

original: de tshe sangs rgyas nyid mi 'gyur //
analyzed: de tshe sangs rgyas nyid mi 'gyur //
translated: then buddhahood will not occur.

original: 'bras bu las rgyu gzhan min phyir //
analyzed: 'bras bu las rgyu gzhan min phyir //
translated: Because the effect is not different from the cause,

original: thabs ni stong pa nyid ma yin //
analyzed: thabs ni stong pa nyid ma yin //
translated: the method is not emptiness.

original: 'di ni nga ste /
analyzed: 'di ni nga ste /
translated: This is me,

original: ston pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan //
analyzed: ston pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan //
translated: the Teacher with thirty-two marks,

original: gtso bo dpe byad brgyad cur ldan //
analyzed: gtso bo dpe byad brgyad cur ldan //
translated: the Principal One with eighty minor marks.

original: ji ltar mi 'dra ba'i rgyus bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar mi 'dra ba'i rgyus bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur /
translated: How could it be accomplished by an incompatible cause?

original: de nas rdo rje snying pos gsol pa /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje snying pos gsol pa /
translated: Then Vajra Heart said:

original: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das bems po'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das bems po'o //
translated: At that time, the Blessed One is inanimate.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: nga ni bems po ma yin no //
analyzed: nga ni bems po ma yin no //
translated: I am not an insentient being.

original: de ci lags /
analyzed: de ci lags /
translated: What is that?

original: nga ni me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
analyzed: nga ni me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
translated: I am the mirror-like pristine consciousness.

original: rdo rje snying pos gsol ba /
analyzed: rdo rje snying pos gsol ba /
translated: Vajra Essence made a request,

original: me long lta bu'i ye shes de ci lags /
analyzed: me long lta bu'i ye shes de ci lags /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat is that mirror-like pristine consciousness?‚Äù

original: rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal ba bden pa ma yin pa dang / brdzun pa ma yin pa dang / dor ba ma yin pa dang / blang ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal ba bden pa ma yin pa dang / brdzun pa ma yin pa dang / dor ba ma yin pa dang / blang ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: Vajra Holder replied, ‚ÄúIt is not true, not false, not to be discarded, and not to be adopted.‚Äù

original: de ltar nga ni mnyam pa nyid la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar nga ni mnyam pa nyid la sogs pa'o //
translated: Thus, I am the same as the others.

original: de'i phyir rnam pa med pa'i byang chub ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam pa med pa'i byang chub ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, enlightenment is not without aspects.‚Äù

original: rdo rje snying pos gsol ba /
analyzed: rdo rje snying pos gsol ba /
translated: Vajra Essence made a request,

original: de'i tshe khyod 'dus byas nyid do //
analyzed: de'i tshe khyod 'dus byas nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúAt that time, you are conditioned.‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Thus, it is said.

original: rdo rje'i 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: rdo rje'i 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa /
translated: Vajra Holder replied,

original: de ltar ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar ni ma yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is not like that.

original: ji ltar me long rnams la gzugs brnyan don med pa dang / bden pa rnam par spangs pa de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo 'dus byas pas kyang zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji ltar me long rnams la gzugs brnyan don med pa dang / bden pa rnam par spangs pa de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo 'dus byas pas kyang zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Just as reflections in mirrors are meaningless and devoid of truth, the ma·πá·∏çala circle is not overcome by being conditioned.‚Äù

original: de ltar he ru ka bsgom bya /üîΩzhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de ltar he ru ka bsgom bya / zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Thus, one should meditate on Heruka.

original: dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i bdag nyid can he ru ka bsgom par bya zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i bdag nyid can he ru ka bsgom par bya zhes pa'i don to //
translated: This means that one should meditate on Heruka, who is the nature of both entity and non-entity.

original: yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang gsungs pa /
translated: Again, it is said:

original: dngos nga dngos po med pa'ang nga //
analyzed: dngos nga dngos po med pa'ang nga //
translated: Entity and non-entity,

original: dang por grol ba'i de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: dang por grol ba'i de bzhin gshegs //
translated: the first liberated Tathagata,üîΩthe supreme among those with and without form,

original: gzugs med gzugs can rnams kyi mchog / zab cing rgya che'i rang bzhin can //
analyzed: gzugs med gzugs can rnams kyi mchog / zab cing rgya che'i rang bzhin can //
translated: the nature of the profound and vast.üîΩIn order to understand the divisions taught in that very [tantra],

original: zhe'o // de nyid la gsungs pa'i dbye ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /üîΩlus la @6a * //
analyzed: zhe'o // de nyid la gsungs pa'i dbye ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir / lus la @6a * //
translated: it is said:

original: ye shes chen po gnas //üîΩzhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: ye shes chen po gnas // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The great wisdom abides in the body.

original: lus la gnas pa'i phyir lus la gnas pa ste /
analyzed: lus la gnas pa'i phyir lus la gnas pa ste /
translated: Because it abides in the body, it abides in the body.

original: lus la med na ni dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus la med na ni dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were not in the body, it would not be observed.

original: de'i phyir lus kyi rgyu blang par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir lus kyi rgyu blang par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, the cause of the body should be taken up,

original: gzhan du na de yongs su mi shes par ye shes gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na de yongs su mi shes par ye shes gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: otherwise, without fully understanding it, the wisdom would not abide.

original: bshad pa'i rgyud du gsungs pa /
analyzed: bshad pa'i rgyud du gsungs pa /
translated: It is said in the explanatory tantra:

original: rang gi lus ni sangs rgyas nyid //
analyzed: rang gi lus ni sangs rgyas nyid //
translated: One's own body is buddhahood itself.

original: lus las gzhan du sangs rgyas nyid //
analyzed: lus las gzhan du sangs rgyas nyid //
translated: Buddhahood is not separate from the body.

original: gzhan ni gang du'ang mi gnas te //
analyzed: gzhan ni gang du'ang mi gnas te //
translated: It is not located anywhere else.

original: mi shes pa yis bsgribs par brjod //
analyzed: mi shes pa yis bsgribs par brjod //
translated: It is said to be obscured by ignorance.

original: ce'o // 'di'i phyogs gcig pa nyid spang bar bya ba'i phyir /üîΩdngos po kun la khyab pa po //
analyzed: ce'o // 'di'i phyogs gcig pa nyid spang bar bya ba'i phyir / dngos po kun la khyab pa po //
translated: In order to abandon the position that it is one part of that,üîΩit is said, ‚ÄúIt pervades all things.‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: And so on.

original: 'dis ni lus la ye shes yongs su shes pa yang dag par yid ches par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa de'i rgyu zhus pa /
analyzed: 'dis ni lus la ye shes yongs su shes pa yang dag par yid ches par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa de'i rgyu zhus pa /
translated: This is the cause of what was said in order to generate conviction in the complete understanding of gnosis in the body.

original: rdo rje'i lus la rtsa du lags zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rdo rje'i lus la rtsa du lags zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The question is asked, ‚ÄúHow many channels are there in the vajra body?‚Äù

original: rdo rje'i lus ni kye'i rdo rje'i lus la ste /
analyzed: rdo rje'i lus ni kye'i rdo rje'i lus la ste /
translated: The vajra body is the body of Hevajra.

original: ma lus par bsdus pa yang gang yang phyogs gcig gis gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: ma lus par bsdus pa yang gang yang phyogs gcig gis gsungs pa ste /
translated: Even though it is completely included, it is taught in part.

original: bden pa'i gsal ba ni gsal ba zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: bden pa'i gsal ba ni gsal ba zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, ‚Äúclarity‚Äù is like ‚Äúclear.‚Äù

original: de la gtso bo'i dbang du mdzad nas /
analyzed: de la gtso bo'i dbang du mdzad nas /
translated: With respect to that, from the perspective of the principal,

original: rtsa rnams ni sum cu rtsa gnyis te //
analyzed: rtsa rnams ni sum cu rtsa gnyis te //
translated: it is said, ‚ÄúThere are thirty-two channels.‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: And so on.

original: gtso bo ni yang 'di rnams su byang chub kyi sems 'bab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtso bo ni yang 'di rnams su byang chub kyi sems 'bab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The principal ones are these, because the bodhicitta falls into them.

original: yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang gsungs pa /
translated: Again it is said:

original: 'khor lo bzhi yi rab dbye bas //
analyzed: 'khor lo bzhi yi rab dbye bas //
translated: The four cakras are divided

original: brgya dang nyi shu lhag pa nyid //
analyzed: brgya dang nyi shu lhag pa nyid //
translated: into more than one hundred and twenty.üîΩThe thirty-two channels are supreme,

original: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin gyi //üîΩrtsa ni sum cu rtsa gnyis mchog / ces so //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin gyi // rtsa ni sum cu rtsa gnyis mchog / ces so //
translated: having the nature of bodhicitta.

original: de la mchog rnams kyi yang mchog gsum du gsungs pa /
analyzed: de la mchog rnams kyi yang mchog gsum du gsungs pa /
translated: Among them, three are said to be supreme.

original: de rnams kyi nang nas rtsa rnam pa gsum ni gtso mo ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi nang nas rtsa rnam pa gsum ni gtso mo ste /
translated: Among those, three channels are principal.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi nang nas rtsa gsum po rnams ni gtso mo'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi nang nas rtsa gsum po rnams ni gtso mo'o //
translated: Among the thirty-two channels, three channels are principal.

original: gal te gsum po de rnams gang zhe na /
analyzed: gal te gsum po de rnams gang zhe na /
translated: If it is asked which are those three,

original: brkyang ma dang ro ma dang // kun 'dar ma'o //
analyzed: brkyang ma dang ro ma dang // kun 'dar ma'o //
translated: they are the lalanƒÅ, rasanƒÅ, and avadh≈´ti.

original: gtso mo nyid kyi gtan tshigs su //
analyzed: gtso mo nyid kyi gtan tshigs su //
translated: The reason they are principal is stated:

original: brkyang ma shes rab rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: brkyang ma shes rab rang bzhin gyis //
translated: The lalanƒÅ has the nature of wisdom,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so forth.

original: thabs dang shes rab dag gis legs pa'i thun mongs ma yin pa'i rgyu dag go //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab dag gis legs pa'i thun mongs ma yin pa'i rgyu dag go //
translated: The three channels are the principal ones because they are the uncommon causes of the method and wisdom.

original: kun 'dar ma ni 'bras bur gyur pa de gnyis su med pa ste /
analyzed: kun 'dar ma ni 'bras bur gyur pa de gnyis su med pa ste /
translated: The avadh≈´tƒ´ is the nondual result of those two.

original: ma ning gi phyir dang / mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir gzung ba dang 'dzin pa spangs pa zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: ma ning gi phyir dang / mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir gzung ba dang 'dzin pa spangs pa zhes gsungs so //
translated: Because it is neuter and free from the two extremes, it is said to be free from apprehended object and apprehending subject.

original: de rnams kyi 'bab pa'i dbye ba'i bye brag ni /üîΩbrkyang ma mi bskyod 'bab pa ste //
analyzed: de rnams kyi 'bab pa'i dbye ba'i bye brag ni / brkyang ma mi bskyod 'bab pa ste //
translated: The specific divisions of the descent of those

analyzed: dpal he ru ka'i 'khor lor gsungs pa 'dir @9b gzhan du mthong ba blangs nas rtogs par bya ba ni /

original: sdig pa bshags par bya ba dang / byed pa sdom pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / yongs su bsngo ba dang / skyabs su 'gro ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed par yang blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: sdig pa bshags par bya ba dang / byed pa sdom pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / yongs su bsngo ba dang / skyabs su 'gro ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed par yang blta bar bya'o //

analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

original: dang por byams pa sgom par gsungs so //
analyzed: dang por byams pa sgom par gsungs so //

analyzed: de la mtshan ma med pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i bsam pa ni byams pa'o //

original: yang ni stong pa'i byang chub ste //
analyzed: yang ni stong pa'i byang chub ste //

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /

analyzed: 'on kyang ma he dang rma bya la sogs pa lta bur bstan pa'i phyir dang / bstan par bya ba bshad pa'i phyir /
translated: But in order to show that he is like a buffalo, peacock, etc., and in order to explain the object of the teaching,

original: de bzhin nyid du gshegs shing zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid du gshegs shing zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he is called Tathagata, etc.

original: dge ba rnams dang / mi dge ba @12b rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa rnams kyi chos rnams kyis dbye ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dge ba rnams dang / mi dge ba @12b rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa rnams kyi chos rnams kyis dbye ba'i phyir /
translated: Because of the division of phenomena into virtuous, non-virtuous, and neutral,

original: de bzhin nyid gsum mo //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gsum mo //
translated: there are three realities.

original: yang na stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / don dam pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba rnam pa lnga'o //
analyzed: yang na stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / don dam pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba rnam pa lnga'o //
translated: Or, they are the five kinds called emptiness, signlessness, the ultimate, the perfect end, and the dharma-element.

original: de de ltar 'gyur ba de la de bzhin nyid du byon pa'am gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: de de ltar 'gyur ba de la de bzhin nyid du byon pa'am gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
translated: He has gone to that reality, or has gone to it thus, so he is the Tathagata.

original: dpal dang ldan zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dpal dang ldan zhes bya ba ni /
translated: He is glorious

original: tshogs gnyis phun sum tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: tshogs gnyis phun sum tshogs pa'o //
translated: because he is endowed with the perfection of the two stores.

original: ci de lta bur yang rtogs zhes snyam du dogs pa la /
analyzed: ci de lta bur yang rtogs zhes snyam du dogs pa la /
translated: But if he is like that, is he also realized?

original: rigs dang 'byung ba lnga rnams ni //
analyzed: rigs dang 'byung ba lnga rnams ni //
translated: The five elements of the family,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.üîΩüîΩ

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po lnga po de rnams nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo ste /üîΩrnam pa yod par 'gyur ba de rnams dang gang dag phung po lnga'i rang gi ngo bo rnams te /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po lnga po de rnams nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo ste / rnam pa yod par 'gyur ba de rnams dang gang dag phung po lnga'i rang gi ngo bo rnams te /
translated: The five aggregates of form and so on are their own nature.üîΩThose that are the nature of the five aggregates are the families of those five aggregates.

original: de rnams kyi phung po lnga'i rang gi ngo bo can rnams kyi phung po lngar gyur pa rnams kyi rigs rnams kyi phyag rgya 'di rnams mi phyed pa'i phyir yang rigs rnams te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi phung po lnga'i rang gi ngo bo can rnams kyi phung po lngar gyur pa rnams kyi rigs rnams kyi phyag rgya 'di rnams mi phyed pa'i phyir yang rigs rnams te /
translated: These mudras of the families are also families because they are indivisible.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin nyid brnyes pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba ji snyed pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin nyid brnyes pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba ji snyed pa'o //
translated: The nature of the Tathagata's attainment of thusness is thusness.

original: 'byung ba rnams ni sa la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'byung ba rnams ni sa la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The elements are earth and so on.

original: phung po ni gzugs dang tshor ba la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: phung po ni gzugs dang tshor ba la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The aggregates are form, feeling, and so on.

original: de bzhin nyid kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa de rnams ji ltar de'i rang bzhin yin /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa de rnams ji ltar de'i rang bzhin yin /
translated: How can those that are the counteragents to thusness be its nature?

original: yang dag pa'i phung po lnga po rnams la gang gi phyir bsgom par bya ba dang / sgom pa po 'di dgag par bya /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i phung po lnga po rnams la gang gi phyir bsgom par bya ba dang / sgom pa po 'di dgag par bya /

original: de bas na phung po lnga'i rang gi ngo bo can rnams kyi phyir /
analyzed: de bas na phung po lnga'i rang gi ngo bo can rnams kyi phyir /

original: sgom pa po med bsgom pa'ang med //
analyzed: sgom pa po med bsgom pa'ang med //

original: cas bya ba la sogs pa yang 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: cas bya ba la sogs pa yang 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: This and the rest is not tenable.

original: de la 'di ni dgongs pa ste /
analyzed: de la 'di ni dgongs pa ste /
translated: The intention here is this:

original: 'byung ba'i bdag nyid phung po lnga po rnams la de'i rang bzhin gyi phyir /
analyzed: 'byung ba'i bdag nyid phung po lnga po rnams la de'i rang bzhin gyi phyir /
translated: The five aggregates, which are of the nature of the elements, are the fuel for the fire of the TathƒÅgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jug pa ni me dang mtshungs pas phung po'i bud shing rnams sreg par byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jug pa ni me dang mtshungs pas phung po'i bud shing rnams sreg par byed do //
translated: Because of their nature, the TathƒÅgatas enter into them and burn the fuel of the aggregates, just as fire burns fuel.

original: yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang gsungs pa /
translated: It is also said:

original: gang zhig gang gis za bar gyur pa de rnams de'i ngo bo bud shing bsreg par rigs pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gang zhig gang gis za bar gyur pa de rnams de'i ngo bo bud shing bsreg par rigs pa'i phyir //

original: rgyal ba'i gar de nyams dga' bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: rgyal ba'i gar de nyams dga' bar 'gyur te /
translated: The dance of the Victorious One is delightful.

original: de'i phyir 'di thams cad 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di thams cad 'gal ba med do //

original: gal te de ltar de bzhin nyid kyis brdzun par byas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te de ltar de bzhin nyid kyis brdzun par byas pa de'i tshe /
translated: If, in this way, it is made false by suchness,

original: sna tshogs cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sna tshogs cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: then nothing at all is manifold.

original: de'i phyir sngags dang rgyud dang man ngag 'di'i don ci zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: de'i phyir sngags dang rgyud dang man ngag 'di'i don ci zhes dogs pa la /

original: sngags dang lha dag yang dag gnas //
analyzed: sngags dang lha dag yang dag gnas //

original: zhes bya @13a * //üîΩba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya @13a * // ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

original: sngags dang lha dag mi gnas pa nyid ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin las zhe'o //
analyzed: sngags dang lha dag mi gnas pa nyid ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin las zhe'o //
translated: The mantra and deity are not absent, but rather, they are from the nature free from conceptual elaborations.

original: 'di ni dgongs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni dgongs pa ste /

original: de bzhin nyid kyis spros pa phyag dang zhal dang dbyibs la sogs pa gzhan du brtags pas 'joms par 'gyur gyi ;
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyis spros pa phyag dang zhal dang dbyibs la sogs pa gzhan du brtags pas 'joms par 'gyur gyi ;

analyzed: yang rang bzhin las byung ba'i chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin spros pa dang bral ba ni ma yin no //

original: yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang gsungs pa /
translated: It is also said:

original: gang tshe las kyis lus bcom pa //
analyzed: gang tshe las kyis lus bcom pa //
translated: When the body is destroyed by karma,

original: de ltar lha ru 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: de ltar lha ru 'gyur ba yin //

original: ji srid las dang las min 'gyur //
analyzed: ji srid las dang las min 'gyur //

analyzed: de srid lus la rnam par gnas //

analyzed: zhe'o // gang dag rigs 'di rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi mtshan ci zhes bya ba snyam pa la /

analyzed: rnam snang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

original: rnam par snang mdzad nas brtsams te /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad nas brtsams te /

original: de la rnam par snang mdzad ni gang /
analyzed: de la rnam par snang mdzad ni gang /

original: gzhan ni gang zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: gzhan ni gang zhes dogs pa la /

original: rjes kyi rim pas tshangs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: rjes kyi rim pas tshangs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: In order to remove this doubt, he says, in the reverse order, Brahma, etc.

original: ji ltar de ltar 'gyur zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: ji ltar de ltar 'gyur zhes dogs pa la /

analyzed: tshangs pa sgrib bral sangs rgyas nyid // ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

analyzed: nub par 'gyur ba dang / ci yang mi nus pa dang / 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba ji snyed pa ste /

analyzed: de'i phyir sgrib pa dang bral ba'i phyir tshangs pa ni sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad du 'gyur ro // chos thams cad la de'i ngo bo'i phyir ram //
translated: Therefore, because of being free from obscuration, BrahmƒÅ becomes the Buddha Vairocana.

original: 'jug pa'i phyir khyab 'jug ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i phyir khyab 'jug ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: Because of being the nature of all phenomena, or because of pervading them, Vi·π£·πáu is Ak·π£obhya.

original: rtag tu sems can gyi don gyi bya ba byed pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rtag tu sems can gyi don gyi bya ba byed pa'i phyir //
translated: Because of always performing the actions for the benefit of sentient beings,

original: zhi ba ni don yod grub pa'o //
analyzed: zhi ba ni don yod grub pa'o //
translated: ≈öiva is Amoghasiddhi.

original: rgyu'i phyir ram rjes su 'gyur ba'i phyir kun gyi bdag nyid la gnas pa'i phyir thams cad ni rin chen 'byung gnas so //
analyzed: rgyu'i phyir ram rjes su 'gyur ba'i phyir kun gyi bdag nyid la gnas pa'i phyir thams cad ni rin chen 'byung gnas so //
translated: Because of being the cause or because of being the transformation of all, because of abiding in the nature of all, all is Ratnasa·πÉbhava.

original: dam pa'i bde ba'i rgyu'i phyir dam pa'i bde ba ste /
analyzed: dam pa'i bde ba'i rgyu'i phyir dam pa'i bde ba ste /
translated: Because of being the cause of supreme bliss, it is supreme bliss.

original: de'i dngos po ni de kho na'o //
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni de kho na'o //
translated: That is its reality.

original: de bas na dam pa'i bde ba nyid kyi phyir de nyid ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na dam pa'i bde ba nyid kyi phyir de nyid ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
translated: Therefore, because of being supreme bliss, that is AmitƒÅbha.

original: dga' ba las bde ba chen po phun sum tshogs pa rtogs pa'i phyir rnam par sangs rgyas ni sems pa po ste /
analyzed: dga' ba las bde ba chen po phun sum tshogs pa rtogs pa'i phyir rnam par sangs rgyas ni sems pa po ste /
translated: The one who is fully enlightened due to the realization of the perfection of great bliss from joy is the one who thinks.

analyzed: sems pa las skyes pas rigs thams cad sdud pa ni sangs rgyas drug pa'o //
translated: The one who is the sixth buddha, who includes all of the clans, is born from thinking.

original: de bzhin nyid du gshegs pa'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad la @13b sogs pa 'di'i de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ni rigs na /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid du gshegs pa'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad la @13b sogs pa 'di'i de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ni rigs na /

original: lha nyid yang ji ltar yin zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: lha nyid yang ji ltar yin zhes dogs pa la /

original: lus las 'byung zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: lus las 'byung zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In response to this doubt, he declares, ‚Äúarising from the body,‚Äù and so on.

analyzed: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid grub pa'i nges pa'i tshig gis de bzhin nyid kyi nyid che ba de bzhin du /
translated: Thus, by the etymology of the establishment of suchness, the greatness of suchness is just as it is.

original: 'dir yang lus la ha ni war byas te de bas na lha zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dir yang lus la ha ni war byas te de bas na lha zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Here also, the body is made into a ha·πÉsa, and therefore it is a god.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dang lha'i lus gsungs pa yin du zin kyang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dang lha'i lus gsungs pa yin du zin kyang /
translated: Even though the body of the TathƒÅgata and the body of the god are declared,

original: bcom ldan 'das yang ji ltar yin zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das yang ji ltar yin zhes dogs pa la /
translated: how is the Blessed One?

original: 'di la bha ga mnga' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di la bha ga mnga' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Here, bhaga is the lord and so on is stated.

original: 'di ni gleng gzhi'i tshig tu bshad do //
analyzed: 'di ni gleng gzhi'i tshig tu bshad do //

original: ma dang sring mo la sogs par gyur pa rnams kyi gar ma dang / chos ma la sogs pa phyag rgya lnga po rnams kyi shes rab nyid rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: ma dang sring mo la sogs par gyur pa rnams kyi gar ma dang / chos ma la sogs pa phyag rgya lnga po rnams kyi shes rab nyid rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /

analyzed: ma ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

original: 'dir sna tshogs kyis skyed par byed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'dir sna tshogs kyis skyed par byed pa'i phyir /

original: ma ni shes rab tu mngon par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: ma ni shes rab tu mngon par brjod par bya'o //

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga po rnams dang / drug pa snying rje'i cha rnams dang / bsnyen pa'i phyir sring mo'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga po rnams dang / drug pa snying rje'i cha rnams dang / bsnyen pa'i phyir sring mo'o //

original: 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin gyis skye bo dga' bar byed pa'i phyir btso blag ma'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin gyis skye bo dga' bar byed pa'i phyir btso blag ma'o //
translated: The washerwoman because she delights beings with the nature of passion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ma lus par 'jo ba'i phyir bu mo'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ma lus par 'jo ba'i phyir bu mo'o //
translated: The daughter because she carries all the qualities of the buddhas.

original: thams cad du 'gro ba'i phyir dang g-yo ba'i phyir gar ma'o //
analyzed: thams cad du 'gro ba'i phyir dang g-yo ba'i phyir gar ma'o //
translated: The dancer because she moves everywhere and is playful.

original: stong pa'i phyir dang reg pa'i sbyor ba med pa'i phyir g-yung mo'o //
analyzed: stong pa'i phyir dang reg pa'i sbyor ba med pa'i phyir g-yung mo'o //
translated: Since it is empty and devoid of the union of contact, it is the low-caste woman.

original: thams cad dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gtum pa'i las byed pa'i phyir dang / nus pa'i phyir gdol ba mo ni shes rab nyid du gsungs so //
analyzed: thams cad dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gtum pa'i las byed pa'i phyir dang / nus pa'i phyir gdol ba mo ni shes rab nyid du gsungs so //

original: lha'i de kho na nyid gsungs nas /
analyzed: lha'i de kho na nyid gsungs nas /
translated: Having taught the reality of the deities,

original: da ni sngags kyi de kho na nyid brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni sngags kyi de kho na nyid brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to express the reality of the mantras,üîΩ[the BhagavƒÅn] declares,

analyzed: brjod pa bzlas pa yang dag bshad // ces bya ba la sogs pa gsung ste /

original: don dam par sngags kyi bye brag ma byung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: don dam par sngags kyi bye brag ma byung ba'i phyir /
translated: Since the mantra is not produced ultimately,

original: gang smras pa nyid de bzlas pa'o //
analyzed: gang smras pa nyid de bzlas pa'o //
translated: whatever is spoken is recitation.

original: gtan tshigs gsungs pa /
analyzed: gtan tshigs gsungs pa /
translated: The reason is stated:

original: a'a li k'a li rab smras pas //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li rab smras pas //
translated: By the utterance of the ƒ™ and the KƒÅ.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is because

original: a'a li dang k'a li dag las gzhan du smra bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te 'on kyang a'a li dang k'a li bdag nyid de /
analyzed: a'a li dang k'a li dag las gzhan du smra bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te 'on kyang a'a li dang k'a li bdag nyid de /

original: de bas bzlas pa 'grub po //
analyzed: de bas bzlas pa 'grub po //

original: ci bzlas par ni grub pa nyid na yang sngags kyi bzlas pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ci bzlas par ni grub pa nyid na yang sngags kyi bzlas pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Even if one is accomplished in the mantra recitation, it is not the mantra recitation,

original: sngags nyid du a'a li dang k'a li dag ni mi 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngags nyid du a'a li dang k'a li dag ni mi 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the vowels and consonants are not accepted as the mantra itself.

original: sngags kyi le'u las sngags cung zad gsungs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sngags kyi le'u las sngags cung zad gsungs pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the mantra chapter mentions the mantra slightly,

original: de rnams kyi gang smras pa de sngags kyi @14a * //üîΩbzlas pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de rnams kyi gang smras pa de sngags kyi @14a * // bzlas pa yin gyi /
translated: whatever is said there is the mantra recitation,üîΩbut

original: yang a'a li dang k'a li dag ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yang a'a li dang k'a li dag ni ma yin no //
translated: not the vowels and consonants.

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das la mi mkhas pa rnams kyis brgal ba de'i lan gdab par de ma thag tu gsungs pa 'di dran par bya ste /
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das la mi mkhas pa rnams kyis brgal ba de'i lan gdab par de ma thag tu gsungs pa 'di dran par bya ste /
translated: One should recall the reply to the objection of the unwise, who say to the Lord:üîΩ‚ÄúThe mantra and deity are truly present
