original: rtag tu ga phur gur gum dag / ces bya ba /
analyzed: rtag tu ga phur gur gum dag / ces bya ba /
translated: ‚ÄúAlways‚Äù is saffron.

original: 'di dag thams cad ni khams bsdu bar gsal lo //
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad ni khams bsdu bar gsal lo //
translated: All of these are clear in the chapter on the elements.

original: rga shi zil gyis mi non cing //
analyzed: rga shi zil gyis mi non cing //
translated: Old age and death are not overcome.

original: zhes bya ba ni dus drug tu byed pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dus drug tu byed pa rnams la'o //
translated: This is for those who practice during the six periods.

original: slob dpon mkhas pa dpal sbyang dka' ba'i zla bas mdzad pa koo mu di zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel las spyod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o /
analyzed: slob dpon mkhas pa dpal sbyang dka' ba'i zla bas mdzad pa koo mu di zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel las spyod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o /
translated: This concludes the sixth chapter, the chapter on conduct, from the glorious Guhyasamaja, the king of all tantras.

original: // / rgyal tshab kyi phyogs las rgyal bar byad pa'i spyod pa'i le'u gsungs pa dang / 'gro ba'i phyir lnga'i le'u las /
analyzed: // / rgyal tshab kyi phyogs las rgyal bar byad pa'i spyod pa'i le'u gsungs pa dang / 'gro ba'i phyir lnga'i le'u las /
translated: The chapter on the conduct for conquering the side of the regent has been explained, and from the chapter on the five for the sake of migrating beings,

original: sgrub pa'i thabs dang srid las nyams pa bsrung ba'i de kho na'i le'u las /
analyzed: sgrub pa'i thabs dang srid las nyams pa bsrung ba'i de kho na'i le'u las /
translated: the chapter on reality for the protection of the means of accomplishment and the degeneration of existence,

original: de kho na'i dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / a'a li dang / k'a li dang / zhes bya ba la sogs pas rigs kyi le'u las dus dang / aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rm'a n'am /
analyzed: de kho na'i dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / a'a li dang / k'a li dang / zhes bya ba la sogs pas rigs kyi le'u las dus dang / aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rm'a n'am /
translated: the chapter on the family with reality, the moon, the sun, the vowels, the consonants, and so on,üîΩand the chapter on mantra with the mantra beginning with akaro mukha·πÉ sarvadharmƒÅ·πáƒÅm,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas sngags kyi le'u las sngags gsungs pa dang / lhan cig pa dang yul gyi yan lag gnyis brjod par bya bar /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas sngags kyi le'u las sngags gsungs pa dang / lhan cig pa dang yul gyi yan lag gnyis brjod par bya bar /
translated: and the two branches of the object and the companion have been explained.

original: tstsho ma'i le'u zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: tstsho ma'i le'u zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: The chapter called ‚ÄúThe Questions‚Äù and so on.

original: 'jig rten la grags pa ni //üîΩlhan cig pa dang sgrub thabs dang // yul dang dus kyi cha dag dang // srid las nyams pa srung ba dang // sngags kyi yan lag lnga ru 'dod /üîΩce'o // grogs kyi yan lag ni lnga ru 'dod do //
analyzed: 'jig rten la grags pa ni // lhan cig pa dang sgrub thabs dang // yul dang dus kyi cha dag dang // srid las nyams pa srung ba dang // sngags kyi yan lag lnga ru 'dod / ce'o // grogs kyi yan lag ni lnga ru 'dod do //
translated: The five branches are well known in the world,üîΩand in the treatises, the Blessed One also taught five branches.üîΩThe five branches are well known in the world,

original: 'jig rten pa la ji lta bar bstan bcos la yang bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang yan lag lnga nyid du 'gyur ba'i yan lag gsungs so //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa la ji lta bar bstan bcos la yang bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang yan lag lnga nyid du 'gyur ba'i yan lag gsungs so //
translated: and in the treatises, the Blessed One also taught five branches.

original: tstsho ma'i le'u zhes bya ba ni so so'i skye bo'i the tshom gyis yin la /
analyzed: tstsho ma'i le'u zhes bya ba ni so so'i skye bo'i the tshom gyis yin la /
translated: The chapter called ‚ÄúThe Questions‚Äù is due to the doubts of ordinary people,

original: dam tshig rig pa'i skye bo ni 'gro ba yin no //
analyzed: dam tshig rig pa'i skye bo ni 'gro ba yin no //
translated: and the people who know the commitments are the beings.

original: tstsho ma ni brda'i skad do //
analyzed: tstsho ma ni brda'i skad do //
translated: ‚Äú Question‚Äù is a symbolic term.

original: de brjod pa ni le'ur bcad pa'o //üîΩgang gis zhes bya ba ni tstsho ma'i le'u yis sam //
analyzed: de brjod pa ni le'ur bcad pa'o // gang gis zhes bya ba ni tstsho ma'i le'u yis sam //
translated: Its expression is the chapter.

original: brda yis so //
analyzed: brda yis so //
translated: ‚Äú By whom‚Äù means by the chapter of questions or by the symbol.üîΩ‚Äú

original: spun ni dngos grub bsgrub par bya ba'i lhan cig pa mchog ste /
analyzed: spun ni dngos grub bsgrub par bya ba'i lhan cig pa mchog ste /
translated: The supreme companion for accomplishing spiritual powers is the brother.

original: brda rig pa'i dpa' bo'o //
analyzed: brda rig pa'i dpa' bo'o //
translated: The hero of the science of signs.

original: sring mo ni dam tshig gi brda'i rig ma'o //
analyzed: sring mo ni dam tshig gi brda'i rig ma'o //
translated: The sister is the knowledge-woman of the pledge-sign.

original: @16a * // gang gis shes par bya ba de'i tstsho ma'i le'u bshad par bya'o zhes /
analyzed: @16a * // gang gis shes par bya ba de'i tstsho ma'i le'u bshad par bya'o zhes /
translated: By whom it is to be known, that is the chapter of the Tsachum to be explained.

original: dngos grub kyi yan lag tu gyur pa spun la sogs pa lhan cig pa mchog gi mtshan nyid gsungs nas /
analyzed: dngos grub kyi yan lag tu gyur pa spun la sogs pa lhan cig pa mchog gi mtshan nyid gsungs nas /
translated: Having stated the characteristics of the supreme companions who are the limbs of power,

original: yan lag lnga pa g-yul las rgyal ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: yan lag lnga pa g-yul las rgyal ba gsungs pa /
translated: he states the five-limbed victory in battle:

original: gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The place and the near-place, etc.

original: 'di rnams ni bcu gnyis te /
analyzed: 'di rnams ni bcu gnyis te /
translated: These are the twelve.

original: zhes 'chad par gyur pa yul sum cu rtsa gnyis las rgyal ba blang bar bya ba'i 'bras bu gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes 'chad par gyur pa yul sum cu rtsa gnyis las rgyal ba blang bar bya ba'i 'bras bu gsungs so //
translated: Stating that, he states the result to be taken, the victory over the thirty-two countries.

original: sa dang grogs dang nor dang ni //
analyzed: sa dang grogs dang nor dang ni //
translated: The earth, the friend, the wealth,

original: g-yul gyi 'bras bu gsum po nyid //
analyzed: g-yul gyi 'bras bu gsum po nyid //
translated: and the three fruits of the battle,

original: gang phyir 'di ni nges 'gyur pa //
analyzed: gang phyir 'di ni nges 'gyur pa //
translated: since this is certain,

original: de tshe g-yul du 'jug par bya //
analyzed: de tshe g-yul du 'jug par bya //
translated: at that time one should enter the battle.

original: zhe'o // 'di ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad do //
analyzed: zhe'o // 'di ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad do //
translated: This is the worldly convention.

original: yul gyi sgras ni mi phyed ma la sogs pa rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis gsungs so //
analyzed: yul gyi sgras ni mi phyed ma la sogs pa rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis gsungs so //
translated: The term ‚Äúfield‚Äù refers to the thirty-two channels, such as the indestructible drop.

original: de rnams kyi gnas la sogs pa'i rim pas rab tu dga' ba la sogs pas bcu gnyis po rnams bsdu ba ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi gnas la sogs pa'i rim pas rab tu dga' ba la sogs pas bcu gnyis po rnams bsdu ba ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The twelve stages, such as the stage of the Joyous, are included in the sequence of the locations and so forth of those channels.

original: gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa //
analyzed: gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa //
translated: The location is the stage of the Joyous.

original: de bzhin nye gnas dri ma med //üîΩzhing ni 'ong byed shes par bya //
analyzed: de bzhin nye gnas dri ma med // zhing ni 'ong byed shes par bya //
translated: The neighboring location is the stage of Stainless.üîΩThe field is the stage of Luminous.

original: 'od 'phro can ni nye ba'i zhing //
analyzed: 'od 'phro can ni nye ba'i zhing //
translated: The neighboring field is the stage of Radiant.

original: tshando ha ni sbyang dka' zhes //
analyzed: tshando ha ni sbyang dka' zhes //
translated: The charnel ground is the stage of Difficult to Conquer.

original: nye ba'i tshando mngon du gyur //
analyzed: nye ba'i tshando mngon du gyur //
translated: The neighboring charnel ground is the stage of Manifested.

original: ring du song dang mi g-yo ba //
analyzed: ring du song dang mi g-yo ba //
translated: The two, Gone Afar and Immovable,

original: gnyis ni 'du dang nye 'du ba //
analyzed: gnyis ni 'du dang nye 'du ba //
translated: are the gathering and the neighboring gathering.

original: dur khrod legs pa'i blo gros nyid //
analyzed: dur khrod legs pa'i blo gros nyid //
translated: The charnel ground is the stage of Excellent Wisdom.üîΩThe neighboring charnel ground is the stage of Cloud of Dharma.

original: chos sprin nye ba'i dur khrod ces //üîΩ'thung gcod dpe med de bzhin du //
analyzed: chos sprin nye ba'i dur khrod ces // 'thung gcod dpe med de bzhin du //
translated: The forest is the stage of Cloud of Dharma.

original: nye ba'i 'thung gcod ye shes can //
analyzed: nye ba'i 'thung gcod ye shes can //
translated: The neighboring forest is the stage of Immovable.

original: gnas la sogs pa kla klo'i skad kyis gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: gnas la sogs pa kla klo'i skad kyis gsungs pa'o //
translated: The location and so forth are taught in the language of the barbarians.

original: 'di rnams sa ni bcu gnyis te //
analyzed: 'di rnams sa ni bcu gnyis te //
translated: These are the twelve stages.

original: sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po nyid //üîΩ'di ni gzhan gyis brjod mi bya //
analyzed: sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po nyid // 'di ni gzhan gyis brjod mi bya //
translated: The Lord of the ten stages is the Protector himself.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: This should not be expressed by others.

original: sa bcu'i dbang phyug ni byang chub sems dpa' 'o //
analyzed: sa bcu'i dbang phyug ni byang chub sems dpa' 'o //
translated: The Lord of the ten stages is the Bodhisattva.

original: mgon po ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
analyzed: mgon po ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
translated: The Protector is the Tathagatas.

original: 'di gnyis kyang sa'i brda gnas pa dang / nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa rnams las logs na med pas /
analyzed: 'di gnyis kyang sa'i brda gnas pa dang / nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa rnams las logs na med pas /
translated: These two are not apart from the signs, the abodes, the near abodes, and so on,

original: de las gzhan pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir brjod par mi bya ba ni dbye bar mi bya ba'o //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir brjod par mi bya ba ni dbye bar mi bya ba'o //
translated: so they are not to be expressed, not to be differentiated, because they are not of a different nature from that.

original: mtshan mo gsungs nas 'du ba'i dus gsungs pa /
analyzed: mtshan mo gsungs nas 'du ba'i dus gsungs pa /
translated: Having taught the night, he teaches the time of the assembly:

original: nyin par nyin kyang rab bshad bya //
analyzed: nyin par nyin kyang rab bshad bya //
translated: The day is also taught as the day.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: And so on.

original: re zhig byo ni mtho ris te /
analyzed: re zhig byo ni mtho ris te /
translated: The day is the higher realms.

original: de las byung ba'i bde ba yang dyo nyid do //
analyzed: de las byung ba'i bde ba yang dyo nyid do //
translated: The bliss that arises from that is also the day.

original: de smod pa'i phyir nyin par te /
analyzed: de smod pa'i phyir nyin par te /
translated: In order to disparage that, it is the day.

original: mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi bde ba phun sum tshogs pa las shin tu 'das pa'o //
analyzed: mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi bde ba phun sum tshogs pa las shin tu 'das pa'o //
translated: It is far beyond the perfect bliss of the higher realms.

original: dam tshig can rnams kyi @16b mar gyi ngo'i brgyad pa dang / bcu bzhi pas mtshan mo nyin mo'i bye brag tu grags pa sngags pa der 'du ba ni /üîΩyi dags zla phyed bcu bzhi dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dam tshig can rnams kyi @16b mar gyi ngo'i brgyad pa dang / bcu bzhi pas mtshan mo nyin mo'i bye brag tu grags pa sngags pa der 'du ba ni / yi dags zla phyed bcu bzhi dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The eighth day of the waxing moon and the fourteenth day of the waning moon are well known as the night and day, respectively, of the Vow-holders.üîΩThe fourteenth day of the waning moon is the night of the Pretas.

original: bcu bzhi pa rnams kyi gang ba ni bcu bzhi pa ste /
analyzed: bcu bzhi pa rnams kyi gang ba ni bcu bzhi pa ste /
translated: The fourteenth day of the waning moon is the full moon of the fourteenth day.

original: cha dma' ba'i tshes ni bde bar dga' ba'i rang gi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: cha dma' ba'i tshes ni bde bar dga' ba'i rang gi ngo bo'o //
translated: The waning moon is the nature of the bliss of joy.

original: brgyad pa rnams kyi gang ba ni brgyad pa ste /
analyzed: brgyad pa rnams kyi gang ba ni brgyad pa ste /
translated: The eighth day of the waxing moon is the full moon of the eighth day.üîΩThe full moon of the fifteenth day is the nature of the innate.

original: bco lnga lta bur yang dag par gang ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin te rgyu dang yid ches pa 'di dag gi tshes ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
analyzed: bco lnga lta bur yang dag par gang ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin te rgyu dang yid ches pa 'di dag gi tshes ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
translated: The Blessed One has taught that these are the days of the causes and the faithful.

original: de la 'dus pa'i bya ba ni /
analyzed: de la 'dus pa'i bya ba ni /
translated: The activities of the assembly are

original: rgyal mtshan dang ni mtshon bsnun nyid //üîΩces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te ;
analyzed: rgyal mtshan dang ni mtshon bsnun nyid // ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te ;
translated: the battle and the piercing with the weapon.üîΩThe battle is the piercing with the weapon.

original: rgyal mtshan ni steng du bcings pa'o //
analyzed: rgyal mtshan ni steng du bcings pa'o //
translated: The banner is the one who is bound above.

original: mtshon bsnun ni dpa' bo 'thabs pas shi ba'o //
analyzed: mtshon bsnun ni dpa' bo 'thabs pas shi ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSlain by weapons‚Äù means dying in battle.

original: lan bdun pa ni skye ba bdun pa'o //
analyzed: lan bdun pa ni skye ba bdun pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúUp to seven times‚Äù means up to seven births.

original: gal te 'di dag thams cad mang ba ma yin pa de ltar yang mtshan mo gsungs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te 'di dag thams cad mang ba ma yin pa de ltar yang mtshan mo gsungs pa'i phyir /
translated: If these are not many, then because it is said to be at night,

original: de'i mtshams nas lan bdun pa'i mthar spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i mtshams nas lan bdun pa'i mthar spyad par bya'o //
translated: one should practice up to the end of the seventh birth.

original: nges pa bshad nas de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: nges pa bshad nas de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Having explained the certainty, for that very reason,üîΩit is said:

original: nyin mo bcom ldan rdo rje can //
analyzed: nyin mo bcom ldan rdo rje can //
translated: ‚ÄúThe Blessed One is the vajra in the daytime,

original: mtshan mo shes rab brtag par bya //üîΩzhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: mtshan mo shes rab brtag par bya // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: and wisdom is to be contemplated at night.‚Äù

original: gsungs pa'i rim pas nyin mo ni bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: gsungs pa'i rim pas nyin mo ni bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: By the sequence of statements, the Blessed One is the daytime,

original: mtshan mo ni shes rab po //
analyzed: mtshan mo ni shes rab po //
translated: and wisdom is the night.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid kyis rnam par rtog pa'i mun pa kun bcom pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid kyis rnam par rtog pa'i mun pa kun bcom pa'i phyir //
translated: There, by the nature of method and wisdom, all the darkness of conceptualization is destroyed,

original: las dang las ma yin pa'i rgyus sdug bsngal nub pa'i rnal 'byor ba'i bya ba dang / bya ba ma yin pa ci yang yod pa ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: las dang las ma yin pa'i rgyus sdug bsngal nub pa'i rnal 'byor ba'i bya ba dang / bya ba ma yin pa ci yang yod pa ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: and because of the cause of action and non-action, the yogi's action and non-action are taught to be nonexistent.

original: mi bya cung zad yod ma yin //
analyzed: mi bya cung zad yod ma yin //
translated: There is nothing at all that is not to be done.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: bya ba dang bya ba ma yin par grags pa 'di ni las kyi lus can gyi chos te /
analyzed: bya ba dang bya ba ma yin par grags pa 'di ni las kyi lus can gyi chos te /
translated: This is the Dharma of the body of action, which is known as what is to be done and what is not to be done.

original: de yang las kyi lus bcom pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rang gi ngo bo las ma byung pa zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de yang las kyi lus bcom pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rang gi ngo bo las ma byung pa zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: And that is not arisen from the intrinsic essence of the thought of awakening, which has destroyed the body of action.

original: yin mod kyi sad par gyur pas byang chub kyi sems kyang rtogs par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: yin mod kyi sad par gyur pas byang chub kyi sems kyang rtogs par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: But when one awakens, one realizes the thought of awakening.

original: rnal 'byor gyi gnyid la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa des ci mi za bar 'gyur ram zhe na /
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi gnyid la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa des ci mi za bar 'gyur ram zhe na /
translated: Does that yogin who abides in the sleep of yoga not eat anything?

original: de'i tshe ci mi za bar 'gyur te za bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe ci mi za bar 'gyur te za bar 'gyur ro //
translated: At that time, one does not eat anything, but one does eat.

original: ji ltar za zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: ji ltar za zhes dogs pa la /
translated: How does one eat?

original: ji ltar bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ji ltar bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: With regard to the doubt, it is said, ‚ÄúJust as one‚Äôs own . . .‚Äù

original: bdag la zhes bya ba ni dang po'i don la bdun pa'o //
analyzed: bdag la zhes bya ba ni dang po'i don la bdun pa'o //
translated: One‚Äôs own is the seventh case in the sense of the first case.

original: de bas na ji ltar bdag nyid de ltar sems can zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩyang na bzhi @17a * //
analyzed: de bas na ji ltar bdag nyid de ltar sems can zhes bya ba'i don to // yang na bzhi @17a * //
translated: Therefore, just as one‚Äôs own, so also sentient beings.

original: nyid kyi bdun pa'o //
analyzed: nyid kyi bdun pa'o //
translated: Or, the seventh case in the sense of the fourth case.

original: ji ltar bdag la zhes bya ba ni rang la thabs dang shes rab kyi yan lag gnyis rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji ltar bdag la zhes bya ba ni rang la thabs dang shes rab kyi yan lag gnyis rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: As for just as for oneself, one realizes the two branches of means and wisdom for oneself.

original: de bzhin du de'i yan lag gnyis dang ldan pa sems can la yang des ci rang gi rang bzhin las gzhan du za bar 'gyur te za bar mi 'gyur ro; ;
analyzed: de bzhin du de'i yan lag gnyis dang ldan pa sems can la yang des ci rang gi rang bzhin las gzhan du za bar 'gyur te za bar mi 'gyur ro; ;
translated: Just as I, in the same way, the sentient beings, who are endowed with the two branches, i.e., means and insight, will not be devoured by anything other than their own nature.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'di ltar sems dpa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'di ltar sems dpa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: For this very reason, he says, ‚Äúthus, the bodhisattva,‚Äù etc.

original: rnal 'byor bdag ces bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin la rtse gcig pa ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor bdag ces bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin la rtse gcig pa ste /
translated: The ‚Äúself of yoga‚Äù is the one-pointed concentration.

original: so so'i skye bo yang za ba nyid ces bya ba'i tha snyad yod do //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo yang za ba nyid ces bya ba'i tha snyad yod do //
translated: The conventional expression ‚Äúdevoured‚Äù exists even for the ordinary person.

original: yin mod kyi gang yang rnal 'byor gyi bdag nyid ting nge 'dzin la rtse gcig pa des ji ltar yang las ma yin pa byed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yin mod kyi gang yang rnal 'byor gyi bdag nyid ting nge 'dzin la rtse gcig pa des ji ltar yang las ma yin pa byed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: However, the one who is the self of yoga, i.e., the one-pointed concentration, will not act in any way that is not karma.

original: de bzhin du las kyang 'das pa dang / bsam gtan la sogs par gyur pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du las kyang 'das pa dang / bsam gtan la sogs par gyur pa /
translated: In the same way, karma, which has become past, future, or meditative concentration,

original: bsam gtan la rtse gcig pa'i phyir bya bar mi nus so //
analyzed: bsam gtan la rtse gcig pa'i phyir bya bar mi nus so //

original: de'i phyir ji ltar 'di'i tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: de'i phyir ji ltar 'di'i tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur zhes dogs pa la /

original: yan lag ji snyed bsgyur ba dang / zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: yan lag ji snyed bsgyur ba dang / zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: [The BhagavƒÅn] says, ‚Äúas many limbs as there are transformed,‚Äù and so forth.

original: gal te de ltar gzhan la yang 'di lta bur 'byung bar 'gyur ro //üîΩzhes dogs pa la /üîΩhe ru ka dpal gnas bzhugs nas //
analyzed: gal te de ltar gzhan la yang 'di lta bur 'byung bar 'gyur ro // zhes dogs pa la / he ru ka dpal gnas bzhugs nas //

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [The BhagavƒÅn] says, ‚Äúdwelling in the abode of ≈örƒ´ Heruka,‚Äù and so forth.

original: thams cad la de ltar 'byung ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: thams cad la de ltar 'byung ba ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not that this occurs for everyone,

original: 'on kyang dpal he ru ka'i gnas su gnas pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor pa la 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang dpal he ru ka'i gnas su gnas pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor pa la 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: but rather it will occur for the yogin who dwells in the abode of ≈örƒ´ Heruka.

original: zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes dgongs pa'o //

original: gal te de ltar shes pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka de smros shig ces snyam pa la /
analyzed: gal te de ltar shes pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka de smros shig ces snyam pa la /
translated: If it is so, then speak of that BhagavƒÅn ≈örƒ´ Heruka.

original: shr'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bshad pa gsungs te /
analyzed: shr'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bshad pa gsungs te /
translated: [The BhagavƒÅn] says, ‚Äú≈õrƒ´·∏•,‚Äù and so forth, which is the explanation.

original: gang gi phyir dpal he ru ka'i gnas su gnas pa'i las dang las ma yin par gnas pa thams cad dge bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir dpal he ru ka'i gnas su gnas pa'i las dang las ma yin par gnas pa thams cad dge bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Because all that is done and not done by one who dwells in the abode of ≈örƒ´ Heruka becomes virtuous.

original: skye bo za bas kyang skyon du mi 'gyur ba'i bye brag nyid ji snyed pa bstan pa'i phyir /üîΩgang dang gang rnams kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: skye bo za bas kyang skyon du mi 'gyur ba'i bye brag nyid ji snyed pa bstan pa'i phyir / gang dang gang rnams kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to teach just how many varieties of beings there are, who are not to be faulted even if eaten,üîΩhe says, ‚Äúwhatever, etc.‚Äù

original: gang dang gang rnams kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
analyzed: gang dang gang rnams kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
translated: ‚Äú Whatever, etc.‚Äù

original: sems can gyi khams ma lus par bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can gyi khams ma lus par bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: means that the realm of sentient beings is taught without exception.

original: gang gis za bar mi 'gyur ba des gzhan dbang du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gis za bar mi 'gyur ba des gzhan dbang du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: By whom one is not eaten, by that one is not controlled.

original: gang gis kyang za bar 'gyur ba ni blos bskyed par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: gang gis kyang za bar 'gyur ba ni blos bskyed par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: By whom one is eaten, by that one is generated mentally.

original: des dbang du 'gyur ba ni de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: des dbang du 'gyur ba ni de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: By that one is controlled, one becomes of its very nature, is the meaning.

original: skye bo 'dis skye bar byed pa'i dngos po'i phyir @17b phung po dang skye mched dang khams so //
analyzed: skye bo 'dis skye bar byed pa'i dngos po'i phyir @17b phung po dang skye mched dang khams so //
translated: Because of the thing that causes beings to be born, there are the aggregates, the sense-spheres, and the elements.

original: sems can zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi shes pa ste /
analyzed: sems can zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi shes pa ste /
translated: ‚Äú Sentient beings‚Äù is the consciousness of sentient beings.

original: de'i byin gyis brlabs kyi sems can no //
analyzed: de'i byin gyis brlabs kyi sems can no //
translated: It is a sentient being by the power of that.

original: de rnams kyi sha ni dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi sha ni dmigs pa'o //

original: de bas na srog chags kyi rgyu ni skye bo rnams su gsungs kyi /
analyzed: de bas na srog chags kyi rgyu ni skye bo rnams su gsungs kyi /

original: yang srog chags ni ma yin te //
analyzed: yang srog chags ni ma yin te //

original: byang chub kyi yan lag ma yin pa'i phyir dang / de rnams kyi sha bza' ba'i skabs ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag ma yin pa'i phyir dang / de rnams kyi sha bza' ba'i skabs ma yin pa'i phyir ro //

original: yang yan lag yin na ni de'i tshe khyi dang ce spyang la sogs pa dang por byang chub par 'gyur gyi gzhan ni the tshom za'o //
analyzed: yang yan lag yin na ni de'i tshe khyi dang ce spyang la sogs pa dang por byang chub par 'gyur gyi gzhan ni the tshom za'o //
translated: Moreover, if it were a member, then dogs, jackals, etc. would be enlightened first, and others would doubt it.

original: srog chags kyi sha bza' ba ma yin du zin kyang /
analyzed: srog chags kyi sha bza' ba ma yin du zin kyang /
translated: Even though one should not eat the flesh of living beings,

original: mi nus pa rnams rang gi rang bzhin rnams kyi phung po la sogs pa bza' ba yang ji ltar yin zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: mi nus pa rnams rang gi rang bzhin rnams kyi phung po la sogs pa bza' ba yang ji ltar yin zhes dogs pa la /

original: rdo rje thod pa'i sbyor pa la //
analyzed: rdo rje thod pa'i sbyor pa la //
translated: In the union of the vajra and skull-bowl,

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: he says.

original: rdo rje ni 'byed pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni 'byed pa'o //
translated: Vajra means to split.

original: thod pa ni bde ba skye ba'i phyir thod pa ste /
analyzed: thod pa ni bde ba skye ba'i phyir thod pa ste /

original: dbye bar bya ba gsungs shing de la yang dag par 'gro ba ni rdo rje dang thod pa'o //
analyzed: dbye bar bya ba gsungs shing de la yang dag par 'gro ba ni rdo rje dang thod pa'o //
translated: The object to be split is said to be the vajra and skull-bowl, which are the correct means of going to that.

original: de ni rdo rje yang yin la thod pa yang yin pas rdo rje thod pa'o //
analyzed: de ni rdo rje yang yin la thod pa yang yin pas rdo rje thod pa'o //
translated: It is a vajra and it is a skull, thus it is a vajra skull.

original: de'i sbyor ba ni nye ba'i sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: de'i sbyor ba ni nye ba'i sbyor ba ste /

original: de'i bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i bya ba'o //
translated: It is the action of that.

original: de'i phyir rdo rje thod pa'i sbyor ba las longs spyod pa nus par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir rdo rje thod pa'i sbyor ba las longs spyod pa nus par 'gyur ro //

original: yang sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud du gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud du gsungs pa /

original: rdo rje sangs rgyas zhes su gsungs //
analyzed: rdo rje sangs rgyas zhes su gsungs //

original: thod pa gsang ba yang dag gnas //
analyzed: thod pa gsang ba yang dag gnas //

original: sbyor ba gsar bar gnas de yis //
analyzed: sbyor ba gsar bar gnas de yis //

original: ngo mtshar sna tshogs byed pa'o //
analyzed: ngo mtshar sna tshogs byed pa'o //

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //üîΩslob dpon mkhas pa dpal sbyang dka' ba'i zla bas mdzad pa /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // slob dpon mkhas pa dpal sbyang dka' ba'i zla bas mdzad pa /
translated: And so forth.

original: koo mu di zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel las brda dang gnas gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o /
analyzed: koo mu di zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel las brda dang gnas gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o /
translated: This is the commentary on the seventh chapter in the difficult tantra section of the glorious Guhyasamaja, called ‚ÄúThe Vajra Student and the Teacher.‚ÄùüîΩThe seventh chapter is finished.

original: // / ming gis yul gyi tha snyad 'dogs pas yang rtogs par 'gyur pa rnams kyi rtsa rnams lha'i rnam par bya ba ste rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: // / ming gis yul gyi tha snyad 'dogs pas yang rtogs par 'gyur pa rnams kyi rtsa rnams lha'i rnam par bya ba ste rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: The channels of those who are to be understood by means of names, which are the conventions of the country, are the divine forms, that is, the objects of understanding.

original: le'u brgyad pa rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: le'u brgyad pa rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The eighth chapter is called ‚ÄúThe Yoginƒ´ Cakra,‚Äù and so on.

original: las kyi lus la phung po dang skye mched dang / khams nyid du gyur pa rnams kyi yang dbyangs dang gsal byed sbyor ba ni rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: las kyi lus la phung po dang skye mched dang / khams nyid du gyur pa rnams kyi yang dbyangs dang gsal byed sbyor ba ni rnal 'byor ro //
translated: The application of the vowels and consonants of those that are the aggregates, sense spheres, and components in the body of action is yoga.

original: de dag gang dag bco lnga po rnams la yod pa de dag ni rnal 'byor ma ste /
analyzed: de dag gang dag bco lnga po rnams la yod pa de dag ni rnal 'byor ma ste /
translated: Those that exist in those fifteen are yoginƒ´s.

original: de rnams kyi 'chad par 'gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du 'khor lo'i rim pa ji ltar gnas pas 'du ba ni 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi 'chad par 'gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du 'khor lo'i rim pa ji ltar gnas pas 'du ba ni 'khor lo'o //
translated: Their assembly, in the manner of the arrangement of the cakra in the ma·πá·∏çala that will be explained, is the cakra.

original: de dag gang du bshad par bya snyam pa la /
analyzed: de dag gang du bshad par bya snyam pa la /
translated: Where are they to be explained?

original: @18a * // nam mkha'i khams su zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: @18a * // nam mkha'i khams su zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is said, ‚Äúin the realm of space,‚Äù and so on.

original: nam mkha'i khams su zhes bya ba ni skabs 'byed pa'i khams su'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams su zhes bya ba ni skabs 'byed pa'i khams su'o //
translated: In the realm of space means in the realm of the opening.

original: bha ga ni ae'i rnam pa ste chos kyi 'byung gnas so //
analyzed: bha ga ni ae'i rnam pa ste chos kyi 'byung gnas so //
translated: The bhaga is the form of the vowel ai, the source of phenomena.

original: dbus su zhes bya ba ni chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi snying por ro //
analyzed: dbus su zhes bya ba ni chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi snying por ro //
translated: In the center means in the heart of the source of phenomena.

original: sgom pa zhes bya ba ni gzhal med khang la sogs pa rdzogs pa'i rim pas lha mo'i 'khor lo sems pa'o //
analyzed: sgom pa zhes bya ba ni gzhal med khang la sogs pa rdzogs pa'i rim pas lha mo'i 'khor lo sems pa'o //
translated: Meditation means the contemplation of the circle of goddesses by means of the completion stage, the celestial mansion, and so forth.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa yang bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa yang bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: The completion stage will be explained by the BhagavƒÅn himself.

original: rdzogs pa bzhag la bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa nyid ji ltar bya zhes snyam pa la /
analyzed: rdzogs pa bzhag la bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa nyid ji ltar bya zhes snyam pa la /

original: 'khor lo sngon du zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: 'khor lo sngon du zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: The passage beginning with ‚Äúthe wheel first‚Äù responds to this.

analyzed: 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni lha'i khang pa'o // de sngon du ji ltar 'gyur ba'o //

original: ci rigs pa ni snga ma'i go rims kyi rim pas so //
analyzed: ci rigs pa ni snga ma'i go rims kyi rim pas so //
translated: In the proper order, according to the sequence of the earlier [stages].

original: lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba nyid //
analyzed: lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba nyid //

original: ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni /

analyzed: lha mo rnams kyi 'byung ba'i rgyu rnam pa lnga'i rim pa las ma 'das pa'o //

original: gang snga ma'i go rims kyi rim pa ma spangs pa ste /
analyzed: gang snga ma'i go rims kyi rim pa ma spangs pa ste /
translated: The order of the previous [goddesses] is not abandoned.

original: gang zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: gang zhes dogs pa la /

original: 'khor los dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: 'khor los dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: The wheel, etc. are said.

original: 'khor lo ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi mtshan mar rab tu grags so //
analyzed: 'khor lo ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi mtshan mar rab tu grags so //

analyzed: sa ni lam las byung ba sa'i dkyil 'khor grub bzhi pa rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor bas ser po'o //
translated: The earth is the square earth mandala, yellow, surrounded by a garland of vajras, arisen from the syllable bhu.

original: chu ni bam las byung ba chu'i dkyil 'khor zlam po dkar po bum pa'i tshar gyis mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: chu ni bam las byung ba chu'i dkyil 'khor zlam po dkar po bum pa'i tshar gyis mtshan pa'o //
translated: The water is the round water mandala, white, marked with a garland of vases, arisen from the syllable va·πÉ.

original: byin za ni ram las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum dmar po rdo rje'i phreng bas phyi rol bskor pa'o //
analyzed: byin za ni ram las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum dmar po rdo rje'i phreng bas phyi rol bskor pa'o //
translated: Agni is the triangular fire mandala, red, surrounded by a garland of vajras, arisen from the syllable ra·πÉ.

original: rlung chen ni yam las byung ba rlung gi dkyil 'khor sngon po gzhu'i dbyibs du ba 'thul zhing 'khyil ba 'ang na gnyis kyis mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: rlung chen ni yam las byung ba rlung gi dkyil 'khor sngon po gzhu'i dbyibs du ba 'thul zhing 'khyil ba 'ang na gnyis kyis mtshan pa'o //
translated: The great wind is the blue wind mandala, shaped like a bow, smoky and swirling, marked with two half-moons, arisen from the syllable ya·πÉ.

original: ji ltar rigs pa ni rim pa ji lta ba'o //
analyzed: ji ltar rigs pa ni rim pa ji lta ba'o //
translated: As appropriate means according to the order.

original: lha rnams kyi ni zhes bya ba 'di ni tshig 'dis lhan cig sbyar ro //
analyzed: lha rnams kyi ni zhes bya ba 'di ni tshig 'dis lhan cig sbyar ro //
translated: Of the gods is connected with this phrase.

original: de bas na 'byung ba bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rnam par gzhag pa ni lha rnams kyi rim pas bya'i yang rang dbang gis ni ma yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bas na 'byung ba bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rnam par gzhag pa ni lha rnams kyi rim pas bya'i yang rang dbang gis ni ma yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the arrangement of the ma·πá·∏çala of the four elements is taught to be by the order of the gods, not by their own power.

original: gang dag gi rigs pas rjes su bya ba de dag gi lha nyid 'di gang zhe na /
analyzed: gang dag gi rigs pas rjes su bya ba de dag gi lha nyid 'di gang zhe na /

original: bye brag gi dngos po med par yang 'byung ba rnams thob pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bye brag gi dngos po med par yang 'byung ba rnams thob pa'i phyir /
translated: Even without specific entities, the elements are obtained.

original: de rnam par dag pa spyan la sogs pa lha mo bzhi po rnams 'dir lha nyid du blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de rnam par dag pa spyan la sogs pa lha mo bzhi po rnams 'dir lha nyid du blta bar bya'o //
translated: Their purity is the four goddesses such as LocanƒÅ, who are to be seen here as the gods.

original: de rnams kyi rim pa ni spyan dang / m'a ma @18b k'i dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma zhes bya ba'i go rims so //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rim pa ni spyan dang / m'a ma @18b k'i dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma zhes bya ba'i go rims so //
translated: Their order is LocanƒÅ, MƒÅmakƒ´, PƒÅ·πá·∏çaravƒÅsinƒ´, and TƒÅrƒÅ.

original: de bas na ji ltar rigs pas dkyil 'khor rnam par gzhag ste /
analyzed: de bas na ji ltar rigs pas dkyil 'khor rnam par gzhag ste /
translated: Therefore, the ma·πá·∏çala is arranged as appropriate.

original: de la dang po steng du sa'i dkyil 'khor de'i 'og tu chu'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de la dang po steng du sa'i dkyil 'khor de'i 'og tu chu'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The first of these is the earth mandala above, below which is the water mandala.

original: de nas kyang de'i 'og tu me'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de nas kyang de'i 'og tu me'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Then below that is the fire mandala.

original: me'i 'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: me'i 'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i rim pa'o //
translated: Below the fire is the wind mandala. This is the sequence.

original: 'og dang steng du rnam par gnas pa so so'i dkyil 'khor de rnams kyi nang gi rnal 'byor gyi rigs pa dang / gsungs pa dang gnyis yod de /
analyzed: 'og dang steng du rnam par gnas pa so so'i dkyil 'khor de rnams kyi nang gi rnal 'byor gyi rigs pa dang / gsungs pa dang gnyis yod de /
translated: The yogi/nƒ´ who is situated below and above these individual mandalas has two kinds of reasoning:

original: de bzhin rkang pa'i mthil du rlung //
analyzed: de bzhin rkang pa'i mthil du rlung //
translated: The wind is at the soles of the feet.

original: rtsom pa chen po gzhu yi dbyibs //
analyzed: rtsom pa chen po gzhu yi dbyibs //
translated: The great undertaking is the shape of a bow.

original: gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor ni //
analyzed: gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor ni //
translated: The triangular blazing mandala

original: sum mdo'i gnas su rnam par gnas //
analyzed: sum mdo'i gnas su rnam par gnas //
translated: is situated at the place of the groin.

original: zlum po'i rnams pa'i gzugs kyis ni //
analyzed: zlum po'i rnams pa'i gzugs kyis ni //
translated: The shape of the circle

original: chu ni lto bar 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: chu ni lto bar 'gyur ba yin //
translated: is the water in the stomach.

original: snying gar yang ni sa nyid de //
analyzed: snying gar yang ni sa nyid de //
translated: The earth is also in the heart

original: kun nas gru bzhi pa nyid do //
analyzed: kun nas gru bzhi pa nyid do //
translated: and is completely square.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: And so on.

original: ji ltar sgom pa po 'byung ba //
analyzed: ji ltar sgom pa po 'byung ba //
translated: The meditator

original: zhes bya ba la yang ni bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la yang ni bsdu ba'o //
translated: is also inclusive.

original: dkyil 'khor 'ba' zhig bsgom par bya ba ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'ba' zhig bsgom par bya ba ni ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that one should meditate on the mandala alone.

original: sgom pa po'i bdag nyid kyang bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: sgom pa po'i bdag nyid kyang bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba dgongs pa'o //
translated: The intended meaning is that the meditator himself should also be meditated on.

original: ji ltar 'byung zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rang gi ngo bo ste /
analyzed: ji ltar 'byung zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rang gi ngo bo ste /

original: de'i nga rgyal gyis gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i nga rgyal gyis gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because one abides in its pride.

original: ci 'byung ba bzhi'i dkyil 'khor dang / lnga pa 'khor lo dang / drug pa bdag nyid 'dis yin zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: ci 'byung ba bzhi'i dkyil 'khor dang / lnga pa 'khor lo dang / drug pa bdag nyid 'dis yin zhes dogs pa la /
translated: As for what arises, it is the mandala of the four elements, the wheel as the fifth, and the self as the sixth.

original: chos 'byung las skyes zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: chos 'byung las skyes zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: To dispel this doubt, he says arisen from the source of phenomena, and so on.

original: chos kyi 'byung gnas su gsungs pa /
analyzed: chos kyi 'byung gnas su gsungs pa /
translated: The source of phenomena is said to be

original: 'di las gcig tu gyur pa las 'byung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di las gcig tu gyur pa las 'byung ba'i phyir /
translated: the source of the one that arises from it.

original: chos 'byung las skyes pa'i 'khor lo ni gzhal med khang yin no //
analyzed: chos 'byung las skyes pa'i 'khor lo ni gzhal med khang yin no //
translated: The wheel arisen from the source of phenomena is the celestial mansion.

original: ji lta bu zhe na 'phar ma gnyis zhes bya ba ni kha sbyor lta bu'i 'phar ma ste /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na 'phar ma gnyis zhes bya ba ni kha sbyor lta bu'i 'phar ma ste /
translated: As for what kind, it is the one with two stories, which is like a double-decker bus.

original: rdo rje phreng bas yongs su bcad pa dang sbas pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje phreng bas yongs su bcad pa dang sbas pa'o //
translated: It is completely surrounded and concealed by the vajra fence.

original: 'phar ma gnyis kyi gtan tshigs gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'phar ma gnyis kyi gtan tshigs gsungs pa /
translated: The two-part reasoning is stated:

original: ze 'bru las ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ze 'bru las ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: From the anthers, etc.

original: ze'u 'bru ni snying po'o //
analyzed: ze'u 'bru ni snying po'o //
translated: Anthers are the essence.

original: gru gsum ni phyi rol gyi mtha' gsum mo //
analyzed: gru gsum ni phyi rol gyi mtha' gsum mo //
translated: The triangle is the three outer corners.

original: cha gnyis kyis nye bar mtshon pa ni 'phar ma gnyis yin no //
analyzed: cha gnyis kyis nye bar mtshon pa ni 'phar ma gnyis yin no //
translated: Indicated by the two parts is the two-part [reasoning].

original: dag pa ni yon po ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: dag pa ni yon po ma yin pa'o //
translated: Pure means not crooked.

original: skyon med pa ni nyes pa med pa'o //
analyzed: skyon med pa ni nyes pa med pa'o //
translated: Flawless means without fault.

original: de'i dbus zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo'i dbus su ste lha'i gnas rnams su'o //
analyzed: de'i dbus zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo'i dbus su ste lha'i gnas rnams su'o //
translated: In its center means in the center of the wheel, in the places of the deities.

original: shi ba ni ro'o //
analyzed: shi ba ni ro'o //
translated: Dead means a corpse.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /üîΩbco lnga'i gdan gyi bdag @19a * //
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na / bco lnga'i gdan gyi bdag @19a * //
translated: What is it like?üîΩThe nature of the fifteen seats.

original: nyid ces bya ba ni bco lnga ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi gdan rnams la bdag gi lus te /
analyzed: nyid ces bya ba ni bco lnga ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi gdan rnams la bdag gi lus te /
translated: The fifteen are the seats of the sun ma·πá·∏çalas, one's own body,

original: gang gi bco lnga'i gdan gyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: gang gi bco lnga'i gdan gyi bdag nyid do //
translated: whose nature is the fifteen seats.

original: zla ba'i gdan yongs su bshad pa'i phyir bshad pa'i rgyud du bdag med pa bskyed par bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
analyzed: zla ba'i gdan yongs su bshad pa'i phyir bshad pa'i rgyud du bdag med pa bskyed par bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
translated: In order to explain the moon seat, in the explanatory tantra, the BhagavƒÅn said that the generation of NairƒÅtmya

original: nam mkha'i khams nang padmar ni //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams nang padmar ni //
translated: In the inner lotus of the space element,

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya //
translated: One should imagine the solar mandala.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: And so on.

original: de la don ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la don ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows.

original: snying ga'i nam mkhar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams te mchod pa byas nas /
analyzed: snying ga'i nam mkhar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams te mchod pa byas nas /
translated: Having imagined the solar mandala in the space of the heart and made offerings,

original: sdig pa bshags pa dang / mi byed par sdom pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / yongs su bsngo ba dang / skyabs su 'gro ba dang / byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang / bdag gi dngos po dbul ba dang / tshangs pa'i gnas bsgom pa dang /
analyzed: sdig pa bshags pa dang / mi byed par sdom pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / yongs su bsngo ba dang / skyabs su 'gro ba dang / byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang / bdag gi dngos po dbul ba dang / tshangs pa'i gnas bsgom pa dang /
translated: one should confess evil deeds, vow not to do them again, rejoice, transfer [the merit], go for refuge, generate the thought of awakening, offer oneself, and cultivate the Brahma abodes.

original: 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid kyi byang chub kyi sems dang / rab dang gur bcing pa dang / de ma thag tu 'khor lo sa bon dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dis ni /
analyzed: 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid kyi byang chub kyi sems dang / rab dang gur bcing pa dang / de ma thag tu 'khor lo sa bon dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dis ni /
translated: The thought of awakening with the character of engagement, the purification of the field, and the instant wheel with the seed and so on.

original: gzhal med khang bsgoms nas de'i nang du son pa 'di ni ro'o //
analyzed: gzhal med khang bsgoms nas de'i nang du son pa 'di ni ro'o //
translated: Having meditated on the celestial mansion, this is the corpse that has entered it.

original: de'i steng du zhes bya ba ni shi ba'i snying gar ro //
analyzed: de'i steng du zhes bya ba ni shi ba'i snying gar ro //
translated: On top of that is on the heart of the deceased.

original: sa bon zhes bya ba ni dbyangs kyi yi ge bco lnga'o //
analyzed: sa bon zhes bya ba ni dbyangs kyi yi ge bco lnga'o //
translated: Seed is the fifteen vowels.

original: phyi nas zhes bya ba ni sa bon gyi mthar ro //
analyzed: phyi nas zhes bya ba ni sa bon gyi mthar ro //
translated: ‚ÄúLater‚Äù is at the end of the seed.

original: bdud las rgyal bas mnan ces bya ba ni bkab pa'o //
analyzed: bdud las rgyal bas mnan ces bya ba ni bkab pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSubjugated by the victory over MƒÅra‚Äù is covered.

original: gnyis 'dus zhes bya ba ni zla ba dang nyi ma dag 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis 'dus zhes bya ba ni zla ba dang nyi ma dag 'dus pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe union‚Äù is the union of the moon and sun.

original: bde ba chen po zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i rgyu'i phyir bde ba chen po ste /
analyzed: bde ba chen po zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i rgyu'i phyir bde ba chen po ste /
translated: ‚ÄúGreat bliss‚Äù is great bliss because it is the cause of great bliss.

original: rab tu skye ba bskyed par nus pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu skye ba bskyed par nus pa'o //
translated: It is able to generate the generation of the great bliss.

original: ci zla ba dang nyi ma 'di dag nam mkha' las lhung bar gyur pa'am zhes snyam pa la /
analyzed: ci zla ba dang nyi ma 'di dag nam mkha' las lhung bar gyur pa'am zhes snyam pa la /
translated: Thinking ‚ÄúWill these moon and sun fall from the sky?‚Äù

original: a'a li zla ba'i gzugs kyis gnas //üîΩzhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: a'a li zla ba'i gzugs kyis gnas // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: The ƒÄLIKƒÄLI is the form of the moon.

original: don ni 'di lta ste shi ba de'i snying gar rjes su mthun pa dang rjes su mthun par bkod cing /
analyzed: don ni 'di lta ste shi ba de'i snying gar rjes su mthun pa dang rjes su mthun par bkod cing /
translated: The meaning is as follows: In the heart of the deceased, the ƒÄLIKƒÄLI is arranged in accordance with the sequence.

original: a'a li dang k'a li dag tshar gnyis yongs su gyur pa dag zla ba dang nyi ma dag ste /
analyzed: a'a li dang k'a li dag tshar gnyis yongs su gyur pa dag zla ba dang nyi ma dag ste /
translated: The two sets of the ƒÄLIKƒÄLI and the KƒÄLIKƒÄLI are the moon and sun.

original: de dag gi 'du ba ni 'du bar gyur pa bde ba chen po ste /
analyzed: de dag gi 'du ba ni 'du bar gyur pa bde ba chen po ste /
translated: Their union is the union of the moon and sun, which is great bliss.

original: de nyid ni de'i rgyu'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid ni de'i rgyu'i phyir ro //
translated: That is the cause of that.

original: dkar mo la sogs zhes gsungs pa la /
analyzed: dkar mo la sogs zhes gsungs pa la /
translated: The phrase white and so on

original: dkar mo la sogs pa'i sgras kyang lha'i rnam pa la mi bya ste /
analyzed: dkar mo la sogs pa'i sgras kyang lha'i rnam pa la mi bya ste /
translated: is not to be taken as referring to the forms of the deities.

original: 'on kyang rgyu gri gug ces bya ba'i mtshan ma la ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang rgyu gri gug ces bya ba'i mtshan ma la ste /
translated: Rather, it refers to the causal sign of the flaying knife.

original: de med na de rnams kyi dngos po med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med na de rnams kyi dngos po med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For, if that were absent, those [deities] would not exist.

original: dang por gyur pa bdag med ma dang / rdo rje ma zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma gnyis yod @19b na ;
analyzed: dang por gyur pa bdag med ma dang / rdo rje ma zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma gnyis yod @19b na ;
translated: The two yoginis, Nairatmya and Vajranairatmya, are the first.

original: ji ltar yang dkar mo la sogs pa zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs zhes rdo rje 'dzin pa la brgal ba'i lan 'chad pa pos btab pa 'di ni dgongs pa ste /üîΩ'das ma thag par gsungs pa /
analyzed: ji ltar yang dkar mo la sogs pa zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs zhes rdo rje 'dzin pa la brgal ba'i lan 'chad pa pos btab pa 'di ni dgongs pa ste / 'das ma thag par gsungs pa /
translated: The reply to the question, How is it that the Blessed One has said 'white and so on'? is the following:

original: zla ba dang nyi ma 'du bar 'gyur pa na /
analyzed: zla ba dang nyi ma 'du bar 'gyur pa na /
translated: The reply is that the moon and sun meet

original: bde ba chen po la de dang de'i tshe rnam par rig pa nyid 'ba' zhig gnas par 'gyur ro //üîΩder yang tshor ba'i phung po ste /
analyzed: bde ba chen po la de dang de'i tshe rnam par rig pa nyid 'ba' zhig gnas par 'gyur ro // der yang tshor ba'i phung po ste /
translated: when the supreme joy arises, and at that time, only the awareness remains.

original: de'i rang bzhin ni dkar mo'o /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin ni dkar mo'o /
translated: There, the aggregate of feeling is the nature of white.

original: de bas na 'di ni gtso mo'i phyir 'di gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni nyes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na 'di ni gtso mo'i phyir 'di gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni nyes pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is said to be the principal one, not a fault.

original: de nyid rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal pa tshor ba tsam gyi lus dang sems kyi so so'i dbye pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal pa tshor ba tsam gyi lus dang sems kyi so so'i dbye pa'i phyir /
translated: That very [mirror-like wisdom] is naturally luminous, the body and mind of mere feeling, distinguished by each.

original: zla ba me long ye shes ldan //
analyzed: zla ba me long ye shes ldan //
translated: The moon is endowed with mirror-like wisdom.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: 'dir dngos po ni gzugs brnyan las gzhan pa'i ngo bos kun mthong ba rnams dang / rtogs pa rnams kyi phyir dang / me long dang chos mthun pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'dir dngos po ni gzugs brnyan las gzhan pa'i ngo bos kun mthong ba rnams dang / rtogs pa rnams kyi phyir dang / me long dang chos mthun pa'i phyir /
translated: Here, things are seen by others with a form different from the reflection, and for the sake of realization, because of the similarity with a mirror,

original: zla ba ni me long lta bu'o //
analyzed: zla ba ni me long lta bu'o //
translated: the moon is like a mirror.

original: me long la ye shes rkyen gyis yang dag par 'byung ba'i ngo bo gzugs brnyan dang mi 'gal ba me long lta bu'i ye shes ni gzugs kyi phung po'o //
analyzed: me long la ye shes rkyen gyis yang dag par 'byung ba'i ngo bo gzugs brnyan dang mi 'gal ba me long lta bu'i ye shes ni gzugs kyi phung po'o //
translated: In the mirror, the nature of the perfect arising of wisdom through conditions, not contradictory with the reflection, the mirror-like wisdom is the aggregate of form.

original: gang la de'i bdag nyid kyis de yod pa de ni me long lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: gang la de'i bdag nyid kyis de yod pa de ni me long lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Where that exists by its own nature, that is endowed with mirror-like wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi a'a li nyis 'gyur 'jug pa'i phyir dang / 'od gsal ba'i phyir sems ni zla ba lta bu'i zla ba'o //üîΩyang gsungs pa /üîΩyid gnyis las ni rnam par grol //üîΩrnam par rtog pa'i rab rib 'phrogs //üîΩnyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das //üîΩzla mtshungs sems ni zla ba nyid //üîΩce'o // mnyam pa nyid ni gzugs brnyan gyi ngo bo mnyam pa'i chos thams cad kyi dngos po ste mi 'dra ba med pa ni tshor ba'i phung po'o //üîΩmnyam pa nyid ldan pa ni de dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi a'a li nyis 'gyur 'jug pa'i phyir dang / 'od gsal ba'i phyir sems ni zla ba lta bu'i zla ba'o // yang gsungs pa / yid gnyis las ni rnam par grol // rnam par rtog pa'i rab rib 'phrogs // nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das // zla mtshungs sems ni zla ba nyid // ce'o // mnyam pa nyid ni gzugs brnyan gyi ngo bo mnyam pa'i chos thams cad kyi dngos po ste mi 'dra ba med pa ni tshor ba'i phung po'o // mnyam pa nyid ldan pa ni de dang ldan pa'o //

original: phyir sems ni dmar po'o //
analyzed: phyir sems ni dmar po'o //
translated: The mind is red.

original: bdun gyi bdun pa dang chos mthun pa'i phyir bdun gyi bdun pa'o //
analyzed: bdun gyi bdun pa dang chos mthun pa'i phyir bdun gyi bdun pa'o //
translated: The seventh of the seven, because it is similar to the seventh of the seven.

original: yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang gsungs pa /
translated: And it is also said:

original: snying rje sdug pas yang dag byung //
analyzed: snying rje sdug pas yang dag byung //
translated: Compassion arises from love.

original: sems can rjes su bzung ba po //
analyzed: sems can rjes su bzung ba po //
translated: It is the protector of beings.

original: dge ba'i chos kyi yang dag gang //üîΩnyon mongs thams cad nges par gnon //
analyzed: dge ba'i chos kyi yang dag gang // nyon mongs thams cad nges par gnon //
translated: It is the collection of virtuous natures.
It is the certain subduer of all afflictions.

original: sa bon phyag mtshan ni zhes bya ba ni lha mo rnams mang pa'i phyir //
analyzed: sa bon phyag mtshan ni zhes bya ba ni lha mo rnams mang pa'i phyir //
translated: The seed-syllables and emblems, because of the many goddesses,

original: sa bon rnams kyang mang ngo //
analyzed: sa bon rnams kyang mang ngo //
translated: the seed-syllables are many.

original: phyag mtshan zhes bya ba ni dngos po'i khyad par med pa'i phyir tshig gcig tu bstan par bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyag mtshan zhes bya ba ni dngos po'i khyad par med pa'i phyir tshig gcig tu bstan par bya ba'o //
translated: The emblems are taught in one word, because of the absence of any difference in substance.

original: de ma thag tu gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ma thag tu gsungs pa /
translated: And it is also said:

original: kun du bzang po'i sems bskyed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: kun du bzang po'i sems bskyed pa'i phyir /
translated: For the generation of the mind of universal enlightenment,

original: bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi spyod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa'i mtshan nyid kyis rang gi sa bon yongs su gyur pa'i phyag mtshan ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te 'du shes kyi phung po'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi spyod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa'i mtshan nyid kyis rang gi sa bon yongs su gyur pa'i phyag mtshan ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te 'du shes kyi phung po'o //
translated: The conduct of unsurpassed enlightenment is the nature of the stage of perfect buddhahood. The individual seed-syllable that has completely transformed into an insignia is discerning wisdom, which is the aggregate of perception.

original: yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang gsungs pa /
translated: It is also said:

original: byang chub spyod pa de bzhin sa //
analyzed: byang chub spyod pa de bzhin sa //
translated: The conduct of enlightenment is likewise.

original: ye shes dag pa zad pa med //
analyzed: ye shes dag pa zad pa med //
translated: Wisdom is pure and inexhaustible.

original: de phyir dkyil 'khor nang gnas pa //
analyzed: de phyir dkyil 'khor nang gnas pa //
translated: Therefore, within the ma·πá·∏çala,

original: de yi rang gi phyag mtshan brtag / ce'o //üîΩthams cad gcig gyur zhes bya ba ni zla ba dang nyi ma dang mtshan ma rnams tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi rang bzhin ma skyes pa dang / ma byas pa dang / gnas med pa dang / dngos po dang /
analyzed: de yi rang gi phyag mtshan brtag / ce'o // thams cad gcig gyur zhes bya ba ni zla ba dang nyi ma dang mtshan ma rnams tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi rang bzhin ma skyes pa dang / ma byas pa dang / gnas med pa dang / dngos po dang /
translated: one should visualize one‚Äôs own insignia.

original: dngos po med pa'i cha gnyis spangs pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i cha gnyis spangs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúEverything becomes one‚Äù means that the moon, sun, and insignia have an undifferentiated nature, the nature of the reflection of all buddhas, unborn, unmade, and baseless, with the aspect of both entity and nonentity abandoned.

original: nan tan zhes bya ba ni bya ba nan tan te /
