original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: The response to this is the same is true of the culmination of the separation from joy.

original: 'di ni dgongs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni dgongs pa ste /
translated: This is the intended meaning.

original: ji srid blo ni 'phel 'gyur ba //
analyzed: ji srid blo ni 'phel 'gyur ba //
translated: As long as the mind is developing,

original: de srid bsgom par 'gyur ba ste //üîΩgang yang blo yi yul med pa'i //
analyzed: de srid bsgom par 'gyur ba ste // gang yang blo yi yul med pa'i //
translated: there will be cultivation.üîΩBut how can one cultivate the innate

original: lhan cig skyes de ji ltar bsgom //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes de ji ltar bsgom //
translated: that is beyond the domain of the mind?

original: de las bzlog pa ni sgom pa zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: de las bzlog pa ni sgom pa zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The opposite of that is what is intended by the term cultivation.

original: bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa dag gi bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa de la yan lag drug po 'di rnams kyis bskyed pa'i rim pa rtogs nas /
analyzed: bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa dag gi bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa de la yan lag drug po 'di rnams kyis bskyed pa'i rim pa rtogs nas /
translated: In the teaching of the BhagavƒÅn on the creation and completion stages, these six branches are the means of understanding the creation stage.

original: da ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to understand the completion stage,

original: nam mkha'i khams su zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams su zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: he says ‚Äúin the realm of space,‚Äù and so on.

original: thabs dang shes rab kyi dbyibs lhan cig skyes pa'i rnam pa bzhi rtogs nas /üîΩde'i bdag nyid du gyur pa'i phyir dga' ba rnams kyis rnam pa bzhi po yang rdzogs pa'i rim pa la yang dag par gnas nas rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /üîΩdga' ba dang po dpa' bo nyid //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab kyi dbyibs lhan cig skyes pa'i rnam pa bzhi rtogs nas / de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa'i phyir dga' ba rnams kyis rnam pa bzhi po yang rdzogs pa'i rim pa la yang dag par gnas nas rtogs par bya ba'i phyir / dga' ba dang po dpa' bo nyid //
translated: Having understood the four aspects of the shape of the method and wisdom that are connate,

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: in order to understand the four aspects that are the nature of that, he says ‚Äúthe first joy is the hero,‚Äù and so on.

original: dang po dga' ba ni dpa' bo ste thabs so //
analyzed: dang po dga' ba ni dpa' bo ste thabs so //
translated: The first joy is the hero, the method.

original: mchog tu dga' ba rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba rnal 'byor ma //
translated: Supreme joy is the yoginƒ´,

original: zhes bya ba ni shes rab bo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni shes rab bo //
translated: wisdom.

original: dga' ba lhag ma gnyis ni //
analyzed: dga' ba lhag ma gnyis ni //
translated: The remaining two joys

original: bla mas 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bla mas 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: will be explained by the guru.

original: 'dis ni lhan cig skyes pa spangs zhes bya ba ni 'di rnams gsum gyis ma reg pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni lhan cig skyes pa spangs zhes bya ba ni 'di rnams gsum gyis ma reg pa'o //
translated: This is what is meant by the innate is abandoned.

original: dga' ba gsum po 'di dag rtogs nas ;
analyzed: dga' ba gsum po 'di dag rtogs nas ;
translated: Having realized these three joys,

original: lhan cig skyes pa de rnams las mtshan nyid dang bral bde ci ma rtogs pa nyid du rung ngam zhes dogs pa la /üîΩ'dod chags med cing chags bral med //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa de rnams las mtshan nyid dang bral bde ci ma rtogs pa nyid du rung ngam zhes dogs pa la / 'dod chags med cing chags bral med //
translated: how can it be right that the innate is not realized, free from characteristics, among them?

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is said: There is no passion, no freedom from passion, and so on.

original: 'dod chags ni zhen pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: 'dod chags ni zhen pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: Passion is characterized by attachment.

original: chags bral ni 'gog pa'i bden pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: chags bral ni 'gog pa'i bden pa'i tshig go //
translated: Freedom from passion is the word for the truth of cessation.

original: @23b gang yang de dag gis spangs pa'i dbu ma ni ro gcig pa'i skad cig ma'o //
analyzed: @23b gang yang de dag gis spangs pa'i dbu ma ni ro gcig pa'i skad cig ma'o //
translated: The middle way that is abandoned by them is the moment of one taste.

original: yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang gsungs pa /
translated: Again it is said:

original: 'dod chags nyid dang chags bral dag /'dres par gyur pa rnyog pa med //
analyzed: 'dod chags nyid dang chags bral dag /'dres par gyur pa rnyog pa med //
translated: Passion and freedom from passion are mixed, free from turbidity.

original: de bzhin chags dang chags bral gyis //
analyzed: de bzhin chags dang chags bral gyis //
translated: Likewise, passion and freedom from passion

original: gcig pu ro mnyam skad cig ma'o //
analyzed: gcig pu ro mnyam skad cig ma'o //
translated: are one taste in the moment of oneness.

original: zhe'o // ji ltar 'di lta bu'i lhan cig skyes pa 'di rtogs par 'gyur zhes snyam pa la //
analyzed: zhe'o // ji ltar 'di lta bu'i lhan cig skyes pa 'di rtogs par 'gyur zhes snyam pa la //
translated: How is this kind of innate realized?

original: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: The other and so on is stated.

original: gzhan gyis ma bsgrags pa bdag gis shes pa yang ji ltar na bdag gis shes zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: gzhan gyis ma bsgrags pa bdag gis shes pa yang ji ltar na bdag gis shes zhes dogs pa la /
translated: How is it that I know when it is not proclaimed by another?

original: dman pa 'bring dang mchog rnams dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dman pa 'bring dang mchog rnams dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The inferior, the middling, and the superior, and so on is stated.

original: dman pa 'bring dang mchog rnams dang // zhes bya ba ni gang la mnyam pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: dman pa 'bring dang mchog rnams dang // zhes bya ba ni gang la mnyam pa lta bu ste /
translated: The inferior, the middling, and the superior are like what is equal,

original: khyad par gyi dngos po med pa'i phyir tha mi dad pa lta bur mtshon par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyad par gyi dngos po med pa'i phyir tha mi dad pa lta bur mtshon par 'gyur ro //
translated: because there is no special thing, it is illustrated as if undifferentiated.

original: dbu ma de ji ltar 'di rnams mi 'dra ba rnams 'dra ba rnams su 'gyur ro zhes dogs pa la /üîΩro mnyam de nyid bsgoms pa yis //
analyzed: dbu ma de ji ltar 'di rnams mi 'dra ba rnams 'dra ba rnams su 'gyur ro zhes dogs pa la / ro mnyam de nyid bsgoms pa yis //
translated: How is that middle way that these dissimilarities become similarities?

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: The cultivation of that equality, and so on is stated.

original: dman pa dang / mchog dang 'bring la sogs pa de rnams ni gang /
analyzed: dman pa dang / mchog dang 'bring la sogs pa de rnams ni gang /
translated: What are those inferior, middling, and superior, and so on?

original: de kho na nyid bsgom pa de ni gang zhe na /
analyzed: de kho na nyid bsgom pa de ni gang zhe na /
translated: What is that cultivation of reality?

original: 'dri ba pos rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'dri ba pos rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to make the questioner understand,

original: dman pa gnas ni phra ba'i don //
analyzed: dman pa gnas ni phra ba'i don //
translated: The inferior state is the meaning of subtle.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: gsungs pa bsdu ba de nyid bsgoms pa yis dman pa dang 'bring po dang mchog 'di rnams kyi dngos po gcig dang ro mnyam brtogs  nas /
analyzed: gsungs pa bsdu ba de nyid bsgoms pa yis dman pa dang 'bring po dang mchog 'di rnams kyi dngos po gcig dang ro mnyam brtogs  nas /
translated: The summary of the teachings is that, by cultivating reality, one should realize the sameness of taste of these inferior, middling, and superior things.

original: yang de kho na nyid bsgom pa ma rtogs pa nyid kyang yod de /
analyzed: yang de kho na nyid bsgom pa ma rtogs pa nyid kyang yod de /
translated: Moreover, there is also a non-realization of the cultivation of reality.

original: de ma rtogs par mnyam pa nyid kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ma rtogs par mnyam pa nyid kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Without that realization, even sameness is not accomplished.

original: de bas na de kho na bsgom par 'dod par bya ba'i don 'di ni stong pa bsgom pa de kho na bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: de bas na de kho na bsgom par 'dod par bya ba'i don 'di ni stong pa bsgom pa de kho na bsgom pa'am /
translated: Therefore, for one who desires to cultivate reality, is the cultivation of emptiness the cultivation of reality,

original: 'on te dngos po bsgom pa'ang zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te dngos po bsgom pa'ang zhe na /
translated: or is the cultivation of things?

original: 'dir gnyis ka yang ma bstan te /
analyzed: 'dir gnyis ka yang ma bstan te /
translated: Here, neither is taught.

original: de bshad pa'i rgyud du btsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bshad pa'i rgyud du btsal bar bya'o //
translated: That should be sought in the explanatory tantra.

original: de la dngos po dang dngos po med pa bsgom pa dgag pa las ni de kho na bsgom par gsungs so //üîΩ'di lta ste stong pa bsgom par mi bya zhing //
analyzed: de la dngos po dang dngos po med pa bsgom pa dgag pa las ni de kho na bsgom par gsungs so // 'di lta ste stong pa bsgom par mi bya zhing //
translated: There, the cultivation of things and non-things is refuted, and the cultivation of reality is taught.üîΩAs it is said:üîΩDo not cultivate emptiness,

original: stong pa ma yin bsgom mi bya //
analyzed: stong pa ma yin bsgom mi bya //
translated: do not cultivate non-emptiness.

original: stong pa mi spang rnal 'byor pas //üîΩstong min yongs su mi spang ngo //
analyzed: stong pa mi spang rnal 'byor pas // stong min yongs su mi spang ngo //
translated: The yogi does not abandon emptiness,üîΩand does not abandon the non-empty.

original: stong dang stong min bzung ba la //
analyzed: stong dang stong min bzung ba la //
translated: When emptiness and non-emptiness are grasped,

original: brtags pa nyung min skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: brtags pa nyung min skye bar 'gyur //
translated: the conceptualizations arise.

original: yongs su spang na kun rtogs te //
analyzed: yongs su spang na kun rtogs te //
translated: When they are abandoned, there is conceptualization,

original: @24a * // de phyir gnyis po 'di dag spang //
analyzed: @24a * // de phyir gnyis po 'di dag spang //
translated: and therefore both of these are to be abandoned.

original: gnyis kyi bzung ba yongs spangs pa //
analyzed: gnyis kyi bzung ba yongs spangs pa //
translated: When the grasping of the two is abandoned,

original: rnam grol gnas dang bral ba ste //
analyzed: rnam grol gnas dang bral ba ste //
translated: there is freedom from the abode of liberation.

original: bzhes bya ba'i kun rtog 'di //
analyzed: bzhes bya ba'i kun rtog 'di //
translated: This conceptualization of ‚Äúis‚Äù

original: de yang de'i phyir yongs su spangs //
analyzed: de yang de'i phyir yongs su spangs //
translated: is also to be abandoned.

original: zhe'o // des mtha' gsum la ma reg pa ni de kho na sgom pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /üîΩji ltar / gang la sgom pa po yang med //
analyzed: zhe'o // des mtha' gsum la ma reg pa ni de kho na sgom pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa / ji ltar / gang la sgom pa po yang med //
translated: The non-contact with the three extremes is the meditation on reality taught by the BhagavƒÅn:üîΩAs it is said:üîΩThere is no meditator,

original: gang yang rnam par bsgom pa'ang med //
analyzed: gang yang rnam par bsgom pa'ang med //
translated: nor is there anything to meditate on,

original: bsgom bya nyid kyang yod ma yin //
analyzed: bsgom bya nyid kyang yod ma yin //
translated: nor is there even meditation,

original: de yi de nyid bsgom par brjod //
analyzed: de yi de nyid bsgom par brjod //
translated: and that is said to be the meditation on reality.

original: ce'o // 'dis lhan cig skyes pa'i de kho na sgom pa rtogs nas sad pas cha gzhan mi mthong ba dang / rang gi rang bzhin gyi chos thams cad bsgom pa ni nga las byung zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: ce'o // 'dis lhan cig skyes pa'i de kho na sgom pa rtogs nas sad pas cha gzhan mi mthong ba dang / rang gi rang bzhin gyi chos thams cad bsgom pa ni nga las byung zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Thus. Having understood the meditation on the reality of the innate, he says the one who is awakened does not see the other part, and I am the meditation on all dharmas of one's own nature.

original: bdag la ji ltar gzhan la yang 'grub par 'gyur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: bdag la ji ltar gzhan la yang 'grub par 'gyur ba'i phyir /
translated: Since it is established in oneself, it is also established in others.

original: gzhan la bstan pa de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: gzhan la bstan pa de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, he says just as in oneself, so in others, and so on.

original: gsungs pa'i rigs pas gang gis gang gi rang bzhin gyi dngos po bsgom par 'gyur ba'i rnal 'byor ba bsod nams kyis stong pa nges kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gsungs pa'i rigs pas gang gis gang gi rang bzhin gyi dngos po bsgom par 'gyur ba'i rnal 'byor ba bsod nams kyis stong pa nges kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: By the reasoning stated, the yogi who meditates on the nature of things will certainly achieve even if he is devoid of merit.

original: bsgom pa'i dus kyi nges pa la gus pa ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bsgom pa'i dus kyi nges pa la gus pa ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to show that there is no respect for the time of meditation, he says:

original: bza' dang btung dang blugs pa dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: bza' dang btung dang blugs pa dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: food, drink, and what is poured, and so on.

original: rgyud gzhan du gsungs pa yang brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: rgyud gzhan du gsungs pa yang brjod par bya ste /
translated: What is stated in other tantras should also be expressed.

original: gzugs rnams thams cad blta ba dang // sgra ni rgyas pa mnyan pa dang // smra ba dang ni dgod pa dang // sna tshogs ro ni za ba dang // las rnams thams cad byed pa dang // gzhan du sems ni mi 'gro ba'i //
analyzed: gzugs rnams thams cad blta ba dang // sgra ni rgyas pa mnyan pa dang // smra ba dang ni dgod pa dang // sna tshogs ro ni za ba dang // las rnams thams cad byed pa dang // gzhan du sems ni mi 'gro ba'i //
translated: performing all actions,üîΩand not going elsewhere,

original: de nyid rig pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i //
analyzed: de nyid rig pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i //
translated: the yogi who knows reality

original: rnal 'byor rtag tu skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rtag tu skye bar 'gyur //
translated: will always give rise to yoga.

original: de ni gnyis med ces brjod de //
analyzed: de ni gnyis med ces brjod de //
translated: This is called nonduality,

original: 'di ni byang chub sems mchog nyid //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems mchog nyid //
translated: and it is the supreme bodhicitta.

original: rdo rje rdo rje sems dpa' dpal //
analyzed: rdo rje rdo rje sems dpa' dpal //
translated: The vajra is glorious Vajrasattva,

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub nyid //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub nyid //
translated: the perfect buddhahood of enlightenment.

original: 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin //
analyzed: 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin //
translated: This is the perfection of wisdom,

original: pha rol phyin pa kun gyi tshogs //
analyzed: pha rol phyin pa kun gyi tshogs //
translated: the assembly of all perfections.

original: 'di nyid mnyam pa nyid du gsungs //
analyzed: 'di nyid mnyam pa nyid du gsungs //
translated: This is said to be sameness,

original: sangs rgyas kun mchog sgom pa nyid //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun mchog sgom pa nyid //
translated: the meditation on the supreme of all buddhas.üîΩThe lord of the animate and inanimate world,

original: 'gro ba brtan dang g-yo ba'i bdag /'di nyid du ni thams cad skyes //
analyzed: 'gro ba brtan dang g-yo ba'i bdag /'di nyid du ni thams cad skyes //
translated: everything is born from this alone.

original: byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas dang // rdzogs sangs rgyas dang nyan thos sogs //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas dang // rdzogs sangs rgyas dang nyan thos sogs //
translated: Bodhisattvas, infinite buddhas,üîΩshravakas, and so forth,üîΩ

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The bodhisattvas, the infinite, the perfect buddhas, the ≈õrƒÅvakas, and so on.

original: gsungs pa de kho na bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu @24b ni de nas bde ba nyid du 'gro ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gsungs pa de kho na bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu @24b ni de nas bde ba nyid du 'gro ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The result of meditating on just that is stated beginning with ‚Äúthen one goes to bliss itself.‚Äù

original: bde ba ni bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: bde ba ni bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'o //
translated: Bliss is the Blessed One, the great bliss vajra.

original: de'i dngos po ni bde ba nyid de de nas 'thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni bde ba nyid de de nas 'thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Its nature is bliss itself, and then one attains it‚Äîthis is the meaning.

original: rtag tu zhes bya ba'i tshig gzhan de yang 'gal ba med de /
analyzed: rtag tu zhes bya ba'i tshig gzhan de yang 'gal ba med de /
translated: The other word ‚Äúalways‚Äù is not contradictory.

original: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni rgyun du'o //
analyzed: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni rgyun du'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAlways‚Äù means continuously.

original: rnal 'byor pa yi khyad par ni /üîΩphyag rgya chen po mngon 'dod pas //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa yi khyad par ni / phyag rgya chen po mngon 'dod pas //
translated: The distinction of the yogi

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: is stated beginning with ‚Äúwho desires the great seal.‚Äù

original: 'dus ma byas kyi ngo bo bdag med pa ni phyag rgya chen po ste /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi ngo bo bdag med pa ni phyag rgya chen po ste /
translated: The nature of the unconditioned, the selflessness, is the great seal.

original: de'i mngon par 'dod pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i mngon par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: de'i mngon par 'dod pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i mngon par 'dod pa'o //
translated: The desire for that is the desire for the great seal.

original: gal te dngos po 'di rnams thams cad kyang rang gi rang bzhin de ji lta bar de bdag cag lta bur rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mi 'gyur zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: gal te dngos po 'di rnams thams cad kyang rang gi rang bzhin de ji lta bar de bdag cag lta bur rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mi 'gyur zhes dogs pa la /
translated: If all these things are not perfect buddhas just as they are in their intrinsic reality, then what is?

original: de rnams dam pa gcig yod min //
analyzed: de rnams dam pa gcig yod min //
translated: There is no other supreme thing.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: rang gis yang dag par rig pa ni rang rig pa ste /
analyzed: rang gis yang dag par rig pa ni rang rig pa ste /
translated: Self-awareness is self-realization.

original: gzhan gyis ma bsgrubs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis ma bsgrubs pa'o //
translated: It is not established by another.

original: gang gis rab tu ma rtogs pa'i ngo bo bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyi sems bsgrub par 'gyur bde yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gis rab tu ma rtogs pa'i ngo bo bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyi sems bsgrub par 'gyur bde yod pa ma yin te /
translated: There is no other mind of the nature of great bliss whose essence is not fully realized, which could be established.üîΩTherefore, from what would the establishment of those be established?

original: de'i phyir gang las de rnams kyi bsgrub par bya ba bsgrub par 'gyur zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir gang las de rnams kyi bsgrub par bya ba bsgrub par 'gyur zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: Thus it is considered.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rang rig ces bya ba la sogs so ;
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rang rig ces bya ba la sogs so ;
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚Äúself-awareness,‚Äù and so on.

original: / ci rang rig pa'i sems byang chub kyi yan lag de ji ltar 'khor bar 'gyur zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: / ci rang rig pa'i sems byang chub kyi yan lag de ji ltar 'khor bar 'gyur zhes dogs pa la /
translated: If the mind of self-awareness is the factor of enlightenment, how could it be in sa·πÉsƒÅra?

original: rang gi rig pa'i 'gyur ba las //
analyzed: rang gi rig pa'i 'gyur ba las //
translated: From the transformation of self-awareness,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: rang rig pa'i 'gyur ba ni rang rig pa'i 'pho ba'o //
analyzed: rang rig pa'i 'gyur ba ni rang rig pa'i 'pho ba'o //
translated: The transformation of self-awareness is the transference of self-awareness.

original: las ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'o //
analyzed: las ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'o //
translated: Karma is virtuous and non-virtuous.

original: dman pa las zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa las skye bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: dman pa las zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa las skye bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: From the inferior means that it arises from conceptualization.

original: de bas na las kyis 'di 'khor bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de bas na las kyis 'di 'khor bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, by karma, this [mind] will revolve in cyclic existence. This is the meaning.

original: ci'i phyir yang ji ltar gnon par mi 'gyur ba de ltar sems te 'dul bar mi 'gyur ba zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir yang ji ltar gnon par mi 'gyur ba de ltar sems te 'dul bar mi 'gyur ba zhes dogs pa la /
translated: Why? How can it not be controlled? It is not disciplined.

original: rang gis byed ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so ;
analyzed: rang gis byed ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so ;
translated: In response to this doubt, [the text] says self-made and so forth.

original: / gal te sems kyi dbang po zhig yod na ni /
analyzed: / gal te sems kyi dbang po zhig yod na ni /
translated: If there were a mind faculty,

original: des de'i tshe de nges par byed na /
analyzed: des de'i tshe de nges par byed na /
translated: at that time it would definitely make it.

original: 'on kyang sems ni rang dbang ngo //
analyzed: 'on kyang sems ni rang dbang ngo //
translated: However, the mind is independent.

original: byed pa zhes bya ba ni spros pa spro bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: byed pa zhes bya ba ni spros pa spro bar byed pa'o //
translated: Making means elaborating.

original: 'phrog pa zhes bya ba ni sdud par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'phrog pa zhes bya ba ni sdud par byed pa'o //
translated: Seizing means gathering.

original: rgyal po zhes bya ba ni spro bar mi byed pa dang sdud par mi byed pa ste /
analyzed: rgyal po zhes bya ba ni spro bar mi byed pa dang sdud par mi byed pa ste /
translated: The king is neither elaborating nor gathering.

original: spro ba @25a * //
analyzed: spro ba @25a * //
translated: The enthusiasm of the bodhisattvaüîΩ

original: dang bsdu ba las rnam par grol ba'i rang bzhin la gnas pa zla ba lta bur rnam par gsal ba'i phyir rgyal po'o //
analyzed: dang bsdu ba las rnam par grol ba'i rang bzhin la gnas pa zla ba lta bur rnam par gsal ba'i phyir rgyal po'o //
translated: 2. The king, because of the clarity of the moon, abides in the nature of freedom from the emanation and withdrawal of the mind.

original: de ltar yang sems nyid ni mya ngan las 'das pa dang / sems nyid ni 'khor ba zhes bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar yang sems nyid ni mya ngan las 'das pa dang / sems nyid ni 'khor ba zhes bstan pa'o //
translated: Thus, the mind itself is nirvana, and the mind itself is samsara.

original: yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang gsungs pa /
translated: It is also said:

original: kun rtog mang po'i mun pas zil mnan cing //
analyzed: kun rtog mang po'i mun pas zil mnan cing //
translated: The mind, overwhelmed by the darkness of many thoughts,

original: rab tu 'joms pas smyo zhing klog 'gyur ba'i //
analyzed: rab tu 'joms pas smyo zhing klog 'gyur ba'i //
translated: is driven mad by the destruction of the senses,

original: chags sogs dgag dka'i dri mas gos pa yi //
analyzed: chags sogs dgag dka'i dri mas gos pa yi //
translated: and is covered by the stains of desire, etc., difficult to remove.

original: sems ni rdo rje can gyis 'khor bar gsungs //
analyzed: sems ni rdo rje can gyis 'khor bar gsungs //
translated: The one with the vajra has said that this is samsara.

original: 'od gsal rtog pa las ni rnam grol ba'i //
analyzed: 'od gsal rtog pa las ni rnam grol ba'i //
translated: The mind, free from the darkness of thoughts,

original: chags sogs dri mas gos par ba spangs pa //
analyzed: chags sogs dri mas gos par ba spangs pa //
translated: is not covered by the stains of desire, etc.

original: gzung dang 'dzin med sems pa mchog gis ni //
analyzed: gzung dang 'dzin med sems pa mchog gis ni //
translated: The one with the supreme thought, free from subject and object,

original: de nyid mya ngan 'das pa mchog tu gsungs //
analyzed: de nyid mya ngan 'das pa mchog tu gsungs //
translated: is said to be nirvana.

original: zhe'o // 'dod chags la sogs pa ni sems kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa'i phyir /
analyzed: zhe'o // 'dod chags la sogs pa ni sems kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa'i phyir /
translated: Desire, etc., are the nature of the mind.

original: de bas na ci des de 'gugs par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: de bas na ci des de 'gugs par mi 'gyur /
translated: Therefore, how can it not be that they are drawn into it?

original: gang gis na dngos po dang dngos po med pa zil gyis mnan nas rgyal po yin zhes dogs pa la //üîΩde kun de nas nyams dga' bar //
analyzed: gang gis na dngos po dang dngos po med pa zil gyis mnan nas rgyal po yin zhes dogs pa la // de kun de nas nyams dga' bar //
translated: By what is he the king who overwhelms both existence and nonexistence?

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: He is the one who delights in all of them, and so on.

original: de kun ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de kun ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'o //
translated: All of them are passion and so on.

original: de gnas ni lhan cig skyes pa'i gnas su'o //
analyzed: de gnas ni lhan cig skyes pa'i gnas su'o //
translated: His abode is the abode of the Innate.

original: nyams dga' bar zhes bya ba ni thams cad zil gyis gnon par nus pa'i gzi brjid kyi phung por ro ;
analyzed: nyams dga' bar zhes bya ba ni thams cad zil gyis gnon par nus pa'i gzi brjid kyi phung por ro ;
translated: He delights in them means that he is a mass of splendor capable of overwhelming all.

original: /'dod chags ni ro'o //üîΩzhe sdang ni sgra'o //
analyzed: /'dod chags ni ro'o // zhe sdang ni sgra'o //
translated: Passion is taste.üîΩAversion is sound.

original: phrag dog ni reg bya'o //
analyzed: phrag dog ni reg bya'o //
translated: Jealousy is touch.

original: gti mug ni gzugs so //
analyzed: gti mug ni gzugs so //
translated: Ignorance is form.

original: nga rgyal ni snang ba'o //
analyzed: nga rgyal ni snang ba'o //
translated: Pride is light.

original: de rnams ni nges par mchod pa'i rgyu'i phyir mchod pa lta bur spyod pa dang phod pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams ni nges par mchod pa'i rgyu'i phyir mchod pa lta bur spyod pa dang phod pa'o //
translated: Since they are the cause of worship, he worships them, that is, he practices and endures them.

original: mi phod do zhes bya ba ni mchod par mi nus pa'o //
analyzed: mi phod do zhes bya ba ni mchod par mi nus pa'o //
translated: He does not endure them means that he is not capable of worshipping them.

original: bcu drug char yang zhes bya ba ni zla ba yongs su spangs pa'i bcu drug gi cha ste shes rab bo //
analyzed: bcu drug char yang zhes bya ba ni zla ba yongs su spangs pa'i bcu drug gi cha ste shes rab bo //
translated: Sixteen parts means the sixteen parts of the full moon, which is wisdom.

original: de mi phod pa dang der ma lus par gnas pa'i yid ni ci smos zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de mi phod pa dang der ma lus par gnas pa'i yid ni ci smos zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
translated: What need be said about the mind that does not go there, that does not remain there?

original: 'dir 'di ni don te /
analyzed: 'dir 'di ni don te /
translated: The meaning here is this:

original: gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'i yul ni longs spyod do //
analyzed: gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'i yul ni longs spyod do //
translated: The object of form, sound, etc. is enjoyment.

original: longs spyod pa ni bcom ldan 'das te /
analyzed: longs spyod pa ni bcom ldan 'das te /
translated: The enjoyer is the Lord.

original: de yang sems kyi rgyal po'o //
analyzed: de yang sems kyi rgyal po'o //
translated: And he is the king of the mind.

original: de bas na 'dod chags la sogs pas de 'gugs par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bas na 'dod chags la sogs pas de 'gugs par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, he is not attracted by passion, etc.

original: gang yang bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis sred pa'i phyir log pa de gang gis kyang dgug par mi nus zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang yang bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis sred pa'i phyir log pa de gang gis kyang dgug par mi nus zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that he who is turned away from craving by the power of meditation cannot be attracted by anything.

original: de nyid rtogs par bya ba'i phyir chos 'byung las skyes zhes bya ba la sogs pa @25b gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid rtogs par bya ba'i phyir chos 'byung las skyes zhes bya ba la sogs pa @25b gsungs te /
translated: In order to realize that, it is said that he is born from the source of phenomena, etc.

original: sgra brnyan gyi rnam pa lta bur chos mthun pa gang las 'byung ba las /
analyzed: sgra brnyan gyi rnam pa lta bur chos mthun pa gang las 'byung ba las /
translated: He is born from the source of phenomena, which is similar to an echo.

original: chos kyi 'byung gnas de ni bcom ldan 'das ma ste shes rab bo //
analyzed: chos kyi 'byung gnas de ni bcom ldan 'das ma ste shes rab bo //
translated: The source of phenomena is the Blessed Lady, i.e., wisdom.

original: gang gis de las byung ba de ni chos kyi 'byung gnas las skyes pa ste /
analyzed: gang gis de las byung ba de ni chos kyi 'byung gnas las skyes pa ste /
translated: He who is born from that is born from the source of phenomena.

original: mkha' mnyam la sogs pa'i khyad par gyis khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: mkha' mnyam la sogs pa'i khyad par gyis khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The wisdom is exalted by the distinction of being equal to space, etc.

original: lhan cig thabs dang bcas zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: lhan cig thabs dang bcas zhes bya ba la /
translated: The bodhicitta is together with the method.

original: lhan cig thabs ni bla ma dang lha nyid kyi rnal 'byor dang / dbang gi rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i rab tu dbye ba'i thabs kyis lhan cig spyod pa'i phyir thabs dang lhan cig byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: lhan cig thabs ni bla ma dang lha nyid kyi rnal 'byor dang / dbang gi rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i rab tu dbye ba'i thabs kyis lhan cig spyod pa'i phyir thabs dang lhan cig byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: The method is together with the guru and the deity yoga, and the method of the divisions of the initiation, the joy of the first stage, etc. The bodhicitta is together with the method because it is practiced together with the method.

original: de dang bcas pa ni de'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / gang yang de dang ldan pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: de dang bcas pa ni de'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / gang yang de dang ldan pa'i ye shes so //
translated: That which is together with that is the follower of that, and also the wisdom that possesses that.

original: thabs rnams ni yod kyang sgom pa ma rtogs par ye shes 'di lta bu 'di 'grub par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: thabs rnams ni yod kyang sgom pa ma rtogs par ye shes 'di lta bu 'di 'grub par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Even though the methods exist, this kind of wisdom will not be accomplished without the realization of meditation.

original: de'i phyir sgom pa nyid ni 'dir ye shes kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir sgom pa nyid ni 'dir ye shes kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so //
translated: Therefore, meditation itself is the method for accomplishing wisdom here.

original: gang zhig nges par rang gi shes rab ring pos rnyed pa'i rol pa'i ros dran pa dang bral ba bya ba gzhan gyis longs spyod pa nyid kyi phyir log pa longs spyod kyis ma bkug pa de ni sgom pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig nges par rang gi shes rab ring pos rnyed pa'i rol pa'i ros dran pa dang bral ba bya ba gzhan gyis longs spyod pa nyid kyi phyir log pa longs spyod kyis ma bkug pa de ni sgom pa'o //
translated: That which is not drawn in by the enjoyment of the opposite, because it is enjoyed by the other activity of the memory that is free from the taste of the enjoyment that is found by the wisdom of one's own long practice, that is meditation.

original: yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang gsungs pa /
translated: And it is also said:

original: bya ba cung zad yod min 'dir //
analyzed: bya ba cung zad yod min 'dir //
translated: Here there is no activity whatsoever,

original: za ba po nyid yod ma yin //
analyzed: za ba po nyid yod ma yin //
translated: and there is no experiencer.

original: byed dang za ba po las grol //
analyzed: byed dang za ba po las grol //
translated: Free from agent and experiencer,

original: don dam rnam par sgom pa nyid //
analyzed: don dam rnam par sgom pa nyid //
translated: it is the meditation on the ultimate.

original: ce'o // gsungs pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi 'phel ba de gang yang /
analyzed: ce'o // gsungs pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi 'phel ba de gang yang /
translated: That increase of wisdom which is superior by the special qualities that are mentioned,üîΩfrom that, how could this wisdom be manifested?

original: gang gis na ye shes 'di mngon du bya bar bla ma la sogs pa'i thabs btsal bar bya zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: gang gis na ye shes 'di mngon du bya bar bla ma la sogs pa'i thabs btsal bar bya zhes dogs pa la /
translated: One should seek the means from the guru and so forth.üîΩIn response to this doubt, it is said:

original: 'jig rten gsum pa de las skyes //üîΩzhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum pa de las skyes // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: It is born from that which is the three worlds.

original: gang las gcig nyid skye bar 'gyur ba de yang bsngags na /
analyzed: gang las gcig nyid skye bar 'gyur ba de yang bsngags na /
translated: If it is praised that it is born from one,

original: yang gang las 'jig rten gsum po skye bar 'gyur ba de ci khyad par du 'phags pa ma yin par 'gyur /
analyzed: yang gang las 'jig rten gsum po skye bar 'gyur ba de ci khyad par du 'phags pa ma yin par 'gyur /
translated: Moreover, how could that which gives rise to the three worlds not be exalted?

original: yin mod kyi des kyang mi nus pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yin mod kyi des kyang mi nus pa'i phyir /
translated: Although it is so, it is not able to do so.

original: ye shes 'ba' zhig thabs su gyur pa las mang po rnams kyi bskyed pa lta zhog gcig kyang yod pa ma yin no zhes dogs pa la /üîΩthabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las //
analyzed: ye shes 'ba' zhig thabs su gyur pa las mang po rnams kyi bskyed pa lta zhog gcig kyang yod pa ma yin no zhes dogs pa la / thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las //
translated: Therefore, it is doubted that not even one of the many is produced from the mere method of wisdom.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In response to that, it is said:üîΩFrom the nature of method and wisdom,

original: ye shes 'di ni thabs 'ba' zhig tsam ni yin te /
analyzed: ye shes 'di ni thabs 'ba' zhig tsam ni yin te /
translated: This wisdom is only a mere method.

original: 'on kyang thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin te /
translated: However, it is the nature of method and wisdom.

original: thabs dang shes rab dag gis dngos po rnams kyi bskyed par blta'o //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab dag gis dngos po rnams kyi bskyed par blta'o //
translated: The production of things should be seen through method and wisdom.

original: de bas na gang @26a * //
analyzed: de bas na gang @26a * //
translated: Therefore, what was said

original: gsungs pa de nyid de ltar brdzun pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gsungs pa de nyid de ltar brdzun pa ma yin no //
translated: is not false in that way.

original: zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
translated: This is the intended meaning.

original: thams cad bsdus pa'i lus gcig pu la du ma nyid du yang 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: thams cad bsdus pa'i lus gcig pu la du ma nyid du yang 'gal ba med do //
translated: There is no contradiction in the single body that includes everything being manifold.

original: yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang gsungs pa /
translated: Again, it is said:

original: de ni gnyis med ye shes brjod //
analyzed: de ni gnyis med ye shes brjod //
translated: That is described as nondual intuition.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems mchog nyid //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems mchog nyid //
translated: This is the very highest thought of enlightenment.

original: 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin //
analyzed: 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin //
translated: This is the perfection of wisdom.

original: pha rol phyin pa kun gyi tshogs //
analyzed: pha rol phyin pa kun gyi tshogs //
translated: The collection of all perfections,üîΩthe self of the animate and inanimate world,

original: 'gro ba brtan dang g-yo ba'i bdag /'di nyid du ni thams cad skyes //
analyzed: 'gro ba brtan dang g-yo ba'i bdag /'di nyid du ni thams cad skyes //
translated: is born from this alone.

original: byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas dang // rdzogs sangs rgyas dang nyan thos sogs //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas dang // rdzogs sangs rgyas dang nyan thos sogs //
translated: The bodhisattvas, the perfect buddhas, the disciples, etc.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: are born from this alone.

original: de'i gnyis su med pa'i ye shes la thabs dang shes rab kyi yan lag gnyis bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i gnyis su med pa'i ye shes la thabs dang shes rab kyi yan lag gnyis bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate the two branches of method and wisdom in that nondual intuition,

original: khu ba'i rnam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: khu ba'i rnam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: he says, ‚Äúthe form of semen,‚Äù and so on.

original: dbye ba so sor rtogs nas dbyer med pa rtogs par 'dod nas /üîΩrang gi rig pa'i ye shes 'di //
analyzed: dbye ba so sor rtogs nas dbyer med pa rtogs par 'dod nas / rang gi rig pa'i ye shes 'di //
translated: Having understood the differentiation, in order to understand the nondifferentiation,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says, ‚Äúthis intuition of one‚Äôs awareness,‚Äù and so on.

original: rang gsal ba'i phyir dang / nyams su myong ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir yang rang gis yang dag par rig pa ste /
analyzed: rang gsal ba'i phyir dang / nyams su myong ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir yang rang gis yang dag par rig pa ste /
translated: It is one‚Äôs own pure awareness because it is self-luminous and because it is characterized by experience.

original: gang zhig lam las 'das pa'i spyod yul gyi phyir gzhan gyis ma bsgrags pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig lam las 'das pa'i spyod yul gyi phyir gzhan gyis ma bsgrags pa'o //
translated: It is beyond the range of the path because it is not proclaimed by others.

original: ngag gi lam ni tshig gi lam ste rkan la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ngag gi lam ni tshig gi lam ste rkan la sogs pa'o //
translated: The path of speech is the path of words, the palate, etc.

original: de las 'das pa ni ngag gi lam las 'das pa ste /
analyzed: de las 'das pa ni ngag gi lam las 'das pa ste /
translated: Beyond that is beyond the path of speech.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The Bhagavat is the Holder of the Vajra.

original: de'i spyod yul ni ngag gi lam las 'das pa'i yul lo //
analyzed: de'i spyod yul ni ngag gi lam las 'das pa'i yul lo //
translated: His range is the object beyond the path of speech.

original: yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang gsungs pa /
translated: Again, it is said:

original: spros med rang gi ngo bo yis //
analyzed: spros med rang gi ngo bo yis //
translated: Without elaboration, by its own nature,

original: de nyid dpa' bo ston pa po //
analyzed: de nyid dpa' bo ston pa po //
translated: it is the teacher of the hero.

original: zhe'o // gal te de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyod yul ni ji ltar na sangs rgyas ma yin pa bdag cag rnams kyis shes par bya /
analyzed: zhe'o // gal te de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyod yul ni ji ltar na sangs rgyas ma yin pa bdag cag rnams kyis shes par bya /
translated: If the range of the Bhagavat is like that, how can we understand it, who are not Buddhas?

original: mi shes pa nyid du gnas par 'gyur ro zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: mi shes pa nyid du gnas par 'gyur ro zhes dogs pa la /
translated: We will remain in a state of ignorance.üîΩIn response to this doubt, it is said:

original: 'di ni byin rlabs rim pa'i phyir //
analyzed: 'di ni byin rlabs rim pa'i phyir //
translated: This is the stage of consecration,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so forth.

original: byin gyis brlab pa ni dbab pa'o //
analyzed: byin gyis brlab pa ni dbab pa'o //
translated: Consecration is descent.

original: de'i rim pa ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pa ste /
analyzed: de'i rim pa ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pa ste /
translated: The stage of that is the stage of the consecration of the Buddha.

original: rang rig pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: rang rig pa'i ye shes so //
translated: is self-cognizing intuition.

original: byin gyis brlabs pa'i gtan tshig gsungs pa ;
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs pa'i gtan tshig gsungs pa ;
translated: The reason of blessing is stated:üîΩThat intuition of omniscience

original: kun mkhyen ye shes de lta bu //
analyzed: kun mkhyen ye shes de lta bu //
translated: is like that.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs pa la kun mkhyen ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs pa la kun mkhyen ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: Omniscience is the Lord Buddha.

original: ye shes de'i zag pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: ye shes de'i zag pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: That intuition is the nature of the uncontaminated.

original: de lta bu ni de dang 'dra ba ste /
analyzed: de lta bu ni de dang 'dra ba ste /
translated: Like that is similar to that.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba ji snyed pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba ji snyed pa'o //
translated: It is called the intuition of omniscience.

original: de bas na de'i byin rlabs skye bar 'gyur te 'di la @26b ngo mtshar ci zhig yod //
analyzed: de bas na de'i byin rlabs skye bar 'gyur te 'di la @26b ngo mtshar ci zhig yod //
translated: Therefore, its blessing arises. What is so amazing about that?

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni kun gyis skad cig gnon te /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni kun gyis skad cig gnon te /
translated: The nature of that intuition of omniscience is that all the world cannot overpower it.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is stated:

original: ye shes skye ba'i skad cig la ro gcig pa'i phyir sa la sogs pa 'di rnams kyis so //
analyzed: ye shes skye ba'i skad cig la ro gcig pa'i phyir sa la sogs pa 'di rnams kyis so //
translated: Because of the single taste in the moment of the intuition‚Äôs arising, these earth and so forth cannot overpower it.

original: rang bzhin rig pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar rang rig par 'gyur bde ltar gnon par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: rang bzhin rig pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar rang rig par 'gyur bde ltar gnon par mi 'gyur te /
translated: The so-called natural intuition is not overpowered in the manner in which it becomes self-cognizing.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu'i phyir yang de'i dpe rigs so //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu'i phyir yang de'i dpe rigs so //
translated: For the sake of this kind of gnosis of omniscience, this example is appropriate.

original: srid par zhes bya ba ni lus can rnams kyi lus te der srid pa la'o //
analyzed: srid par zhes bya ba ni lus can rnams kyi lus te der srid pa la'o //
translated: Existence means the bodies of embodied beings, and it is in that [existence] that existence occurs.

original: 'dir gti mug dang zhe sdang la sogs pa 'byung ba'i phyir srid pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir gti mug dang zhe sdang la sogs pa 'byung ba'i phyir srid pa'o //
translated: Here, existence occurs because of the arising of delusion, hatred, and so forth.

original: dngos grub ni rang dang gzhan gyi don nus pa'o //
analyzed: dngos grub ni rang dang gzhan gyi don nus pa'o //
translated: Accomplishment means the ability to benefit oneself and others.

original: dag pa ni yongs su sbyangs pa'i chos rnams so //
analyzed: dag pa ni yongs su sbyangs pa'i chos rnams so //
translated: Purity refers to the purified phenomena.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: ye shes med par rig byed dang // grub pa'i mtha' la sogs pa rnams kyis ma yin no //
analyzed: ye shes med par rig byed dang // grub pa'i mtha' la sogs pa rnams kyis ma yin no //
translated: without gnosis, there is no knowledge, no philosophy, and so forth.

original: de'i phyir ye shes brtan par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ye shes brtan par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, gnosis should be stabilized.

original: rnam pa gang gis zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: rnam pa gang gis zhes dogs pa la /
translated: By what aspect?

original: de nyid rnal 'byor gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid rnal 'byor gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: It is said, by the yoga of reality itself, and so on.

original: de nyid ni byang chub kyi sems te rigs lnga'i spros pa med pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni byang chub kyi sems te rigs lnga'i spros pa med pa'o //
translated: Reality itself is the mind of enlightenment, the unelaborated nature of the five families.

original: de'i rnal 'byor ni de'i sgom pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rnal 'byor ni de'i sgom pa'o //
translated: The yoga of that is the meditation on that.

original: ji ltar chu bo 'bab pa dang mar me la sogs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rgyun gyis gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji ltar chu bo 'bab pa dang mar me la sogs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rgyun gyis gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Just as a river flows and a lamp burns, so too they abide by the continuity of the uninterrupted stream.

original: de bas na de ltar de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor pas nyin dang mtshan du mtshan mo dang nyin mo bye brag med par gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na de ltar de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor pas nyin dang mtshan du mtshan mo dang nyin mo bye brag med par gzhag par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, in this way, the yogi/nƒ´ of reality should rest day and night, without distinction of night and day.

original: gzhan du na chu bo'i rgyun zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dpe mi rigs so //
analyzed: gzhan du na chu bo'i rgyun zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dpe mi rigs so //
translated: Otherwise, the example of the river and so forth would not be appropriate.

original: slob dpon mkhas pa dpal sbyang dka' ba'i zla bas mdzad pa /
analyzed: slob dpon mkhas pa dpal sbyang dka' ba'i zla bas mdzad pa /
translated: The commentary on the difficult points of the glorious GuhyasamƒÅja composed by the master ≈örƒ´dharak·πõ·π£·πáƒÅcƒÅrya

original: koo mu di zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel las rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o /
analyzed: koo mu di zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel las rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o /
translated: is called the Ko‚Äôumudi. The eighth chapter is the chapter on the yoginƒ´ wheel.

original: // / rnal 'byor ma gsungs nas de rnams kyi yongs su dag pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir rnam par dag pa'i le'u bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: // / rnal 'byor ma gsungs nas de rnams kyi yongs su dag pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir rnam par dag pa'i le'u bshad par bya'o //
translated: Having taught the yoginƒ´s, in order to understand their complete purity, the chapter on complete purity should be explained.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: gang dag gi rnam par dag pa de ji lta bu zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: gang dag gi rnam par dag pa de ji lta bu zhes dogs pa la /
translated: What is the complete purity of those?

original: spyi'i rnam pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: spyi'i rnam pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The phrase in all respects and so on.

original: khyad par du 'phags pa'i dag pa ni rnam par sbyang ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par du 'phags pa'i dag pa ni rnam par sbyang ba'o //
translated: The purification of the special is the purification of the special.

original: ji lta ji ltar gnas pa'i chos de ltar rnam par gzhag pa nyid du byas te /
analyzed: ji lta ji ltar gnas pa'i chos de ltar rnam par gzhag pa nyid du byas te /
translated: Just as the phenomena are established, so is the purification.

original: rnam par dag pa de ni de bzhin nyid du brjod do //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa de ni de bzhin nyid du brjod do //
translated: That purification is called suchness.

original: ci gang zhig ma dag pa de ni sbyang bar mi nus te /
analyzed: ci gang zhig ma dag pa de ni sbyang bar mi nus te /
translated: If something is impure, it cannot be purified,

original: ma dag pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir ro //
analyzed: ma dag pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir ro //
translated: because it has an impure nature.

original: @27a * // gang yang dag pa de yang sbyang ba ma yin te 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde'i nus pa med pa dang don med pa dag gis dag pa 'di blo dang mi ldan pa lta bur mtshon te zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: @27a * // gang yang dag pa de yang sbyang ba ma yin te 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro // de'i nus pa med pa dang don med pa dag gis dag pa 'di blo dang mi ldan pa lta bur mtshon te zhes dogs pa la /
translated: If something is pure, it cannot be purified, because that would be contradictory.üîΩ The phrase this purification is like an ignorant person is a metaphor for the absence of the capacity and the absence of the purpose.

original: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: The phrase naturally pure and so on is stated in response to that doubt.

original: mi shes pa ni ma rig pa'o //
analyzed: mi shes pa ni ma rig pa'o //
translated: Ignorance is the absence of knowledge.

original: nyon mongs pa ni de las byung ba ste /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa ni de las byung ba ste /
translated: Afflictions arise from that.üîΩ

original: mi shes pa las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mi shes pa las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa'o //
translated: The afflictions that arise from ignorance are desire, hatred, and so on.

original: de rnams kyi sgrib pa rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa yang dbang po la sogs pa gser la sogs pa lta bur rnyog pa med pa'i bag chags sbyong bar byed de ;
analyzed: de rnams kyi sgrib pa rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa yang dbang po la sogs pa gser la sogs pa lta bur rnyog pa med pa'i bag chags sbyong bar byed de ;
translated: Their obscurations are purified by nature, and the latent tendencies of the faculties and so on are purified like uncontaminated gold.

original: de'i phyir rnam pa 'di ni de bzhin nyid do zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam pa 'di ni de bzhin nyid do zhes gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, this aspect is suchness.

original: gal te rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i chos rnams la ji ltar na sems can rnams sangs rgyas ma yin zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: gal te rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i chos rnams la ji ltar na sems can rnams sangs rgyas ma yin zhes dogs pa la /
translated: If the phenomena that are pure by nature are not buddhas, why are sentient beings not buddhas?

original: rang rig bdag nyid dag pa nyid //
analyzed: rang rig bdag nyid dag pa nyid //
translated: The purity of the nature of reflexive awareness

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so on.

original: gang kho nas rang gis rig pa ni dag pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gang kho nas rang gis rig pa ni dag pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Since it is pure because it is reflexive awareness,

original: de nyid rnam par grol bar 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de nyid rnam par grol bar 'gyur gyi /
translated: it is liberated.

original: yang gzhan thams cad ni thar pa thob pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yang gzhan thams cad ni thar pa thob pa ni ma yin no //
translated: However, others do not attain liberation.

original: dngos po nyid kyang ji ltar yongs su dag / gang gi phyir dag pa'i blo bskyed par bya zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: dngos po nyid kyang ji ltar yongs su dag / gang gi phyir dag pa'i blo bskyed par bya zhes dogs pa la /
translated: In order to generate the mind of enlightenment, one should have confidence in the purity of all things.

original: 'di ltar 'gro ba sangs rgyas 'gyur //üîΩzhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'gro ba sangs rgyas 'gyur // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Thus, the world will become a Buddha.

original: sangs rgyas ni thams cad rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni thams cad rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Buddhahood is the realization of everything.

original: de'i 'gyur ba 'di ni byang chub kyi sems las 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i 'gyur ba 'di ni byang chub kyi sems las 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The world is its transformation, because it arises from the mind of enlightenment.

original: 'gro ba ni de dag pa ste dngos po thams cad ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'gro ba ni de dag pa ste dngos po thams cad ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The world is the purity of that, i.e., of Buddhahood. The meaning is that it is all things.

original: gal te de ltar na ni de'i tshe ma dag pa ni gang /
analyzed: gal te de ltar na ni de'i tshe ma dag pa ni gang /
translated: If that is so, then what is impure?

original: dag pa ni gang gi don du zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: dag pa ni gang gi don du zhes dogs pa la /
translated: And what is the purpose of purity?

original: gzugs la sogs pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Form, etc.

original: gzung ba nyid kyi dri mas gos pas ma dag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzung ba nyid kyi dri mas gos pas ma dag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: are impure because they are defiled by the stain of being an object.

original: ci gzugs la sogs pa 'di rnams spang bar bya ba'am /
analyzed: ci gzugs la sogs pa 'di rnams spang bar bya ba'am /
translated: Are these forms, etc., to be abandoned or not?

original: spang bar mi bya zhes snyam pa la /
analyzed: spang bar mi bya zhes snyam pa la /
translated: In order to resolve this doubt, it is said:

original: bsten bya 'di dag bsten pa nyid //
analyzed: bsten bya 'di dag bsten pa nyid //
translated: These are to be relied upon, and they are relied upon.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: bsten bya ni nye bar longs spyod par bya'o //
analyzed: bsten bya ni nye bar longs spyod par bya'o //
translated: The object of reliance is to be enjoyed.

original: yang na bsten bya ni lha mo gti mug rdo rje ma la sogs pa drug gi rang bzhin gyi phyir gsol ba gdab pa'o //
analyzed: yang na bsten bya ni lha mo gti mug rdo rje ma la sogs pa drug gi rang bzhin gyi phyir gsol ba gdab pa'o //
translated: Or, the object of reliance is the supplication, because it has the nature of the six goddesses, such as MohavajrƒÅ.

original: dag pas dug med byas nas ni //
analyzed: dag pas dug med byas nas ni //
translated: Having purified it, one should render it free of poison.

original: zhes bya bas ni dag pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya bas ni dag pa gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said to be purified.

original: gzugs phung rdo rje ma yin te /
analyzed: gzugs phung rdo rje ma yin te /
translated: The form aggregate is Vajrƒ´,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: and so forth.

original: 'di ni gti mug gi gnyid las @27b sang pas phung po la sogs pa rnam par rtogs nas dag pa ma rnyed par yang rnyed pa lta bur sdud par byed pas /
analyzed: 'di ni gti mug gi gnyid las @27b sang pas phung po la sogs pa rnam par rtogs nas dag pa ma rnyed par yang rnyed pa lta bur sdud par byed pas /
translated: This is because, having awakened from the sleep of delusion, one realizes the aggregates, and so forth, and, as if one has found what was not found before, one gathers them.

original: shin tu rab tu dga' bas gar byed cing glu blangs pa ni /
analyzed: shin tu rab tu dga' bas gar byed cing glu blangs pa ni /
translated: One should dance and sing with great joy.

original: gang dang gang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang dang gang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: This is indicated by whatever and with whatever.

original: slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal sbyang dka' ba'i zla bas mdzad pa koo mu di zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel las rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o /
analyzed: slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal sbyang dka' ba'i zla bas mdzad pa koo mu di zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel las rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o /
translated: This is the ninth chapter of the commentary called the ‚ÄúLight of the Moon,‚Äù composed by the great scholar ≈örƒ´ Durvekami≈õra, on the Ko·π≠i.

original: // / slob ma dbang bskur ba'i don du rgyu'i gtso bo dkyil 'khor brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: // / slob ma dbang bskur ba'i don du rgyu'i gtso bo dkyil 'khor brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: The consecration of the disciples, the principal cause, is stated for the sake of the mandala.

original: le'u bcu pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: le'u bcu pa gsungs pa /
translated: The tenth chapter is stated.

original: ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi rim pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
analyzed: ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi rim pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
translated: As for the procedure of the mandala, etc.,

original: ji ltar rim pa ni go rims bzhin du ste //
analyzed: ji ltar rim pa ni go rims bzhin du ste //
translated: the procedure is in order.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o //
translated: The mandala rite.

original: nor 'dzin sbyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: nor 'dzin sbyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: As for purifying the earth, etc.,

original: sa gzung ba la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi thabs legs par bsdus pa las brjod pa'i phyir 'dir ma smras te /
analyzed: sa gzung ba la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi thabs legs par bsdus pa las brjod pa'i phyir 'dir ma smras te /
translated: since the method of the mandala, such as the taking of the earth, is well summarized in the Tantra, it is not stated here.

original: der ma gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshad /
analyzed: der ma gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshad /
translated: The measure of the mandala not stated there

original: 'dir khru gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dir khru gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: is stated here as three cubits, etc.

original: dkyil 'khor khru gsum pa bshad pa'i rgyud nyid las kyang /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor khru gsum pa bshad pa'i rgyud nyid las kyang /
translated: In the Tantra itself, which explains the three cubit mandala,üîΩit is stated:

original: rdo rje can gyi khru gsum ste //
analyzed: rdo rje can gyi khru gsum ste //
translated: Three cubits of the vajri,

original: zhe'o // khru gsum nyid ni dkyil 'khor 'di'i lhag pa yang ma yin la chad pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: zhe'o // khru gsum nyid ni dkyil 'khor 'di'i lhag pa yang ma yin la chad pa yang ma yin no //

original: yang ni mthe bong gsum lhag par //
analyzed: yang ni mthe bong gsum lhag par //

original: zhes bya ba la ni zhes bya ba ni nges par gzung ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la ni zhes bya ba ni nges par gzung ba'o //
translated: Here, indeed is a particle of emphasis.

original: yang zhes bya ba ni mnan pa'i don to //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba ni mnan pa'i don to //
translated: And again has the sense of superimposition.

original: de bas na mthe bong gsum lhag par nges pa nyid du 'di shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na mthe bong gsum lhag par nges pa nyid du 'di shes par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should understand that the three-finger-widths are definitely superior.

original: gsum ni zhes bya ba ni yan lag dang nying lag rnams te 'di'i mtha' rnams so //
analyzed: gsum ni zhes bya ba ni yan lag dang nying lag rnams te 'di'i mtha' rnams so //
translated: The three are the major and minor limbs, the extremities of this [body].

original: nam mkha'i khams su bha ga bsam //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams su bha ga bsam //
translated: The BhagavƒÅn said, One should visualize the bhaga in the space element.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs pa 'dir /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs pa 'dir /
translated: Here,

original: bha ga ni gsum zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: bha ga ni gsum zhes gsungs so //
translated: the bhaga is said to be three.

original: der mthe bo ni rdo rje'o //
analyzed: der mthe bo ni rdo rje'o //
translated: There, the thumb is the vajra.

original: de'i lhag pa ni phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: de'i lhag pa ni phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mthar thug pa'o //
translated: The remainder of that is the outer ma·πá·∏çala.

original: gang gi mthe bong gsum lhag pa ni de'o //
analyzed: gang gi mthe bong gsum lhag pa ni de'o //
translated: The one whose thumb is superior is that [vajra master].

original: yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang gsungs pa /
translated: Again, it is said:

original: padma'i mthe bo gzir ba las //
analyzed: padma'i mthe bo gzir ba las //
translated: By pressing the lotus thumb,

original: de tshe ro ni dbyung bar bya //
analyzed: de tshe ro ni dbyung bar bya //
translated: at that time, one should emit the sound.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: And so on.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi dgos pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi dgos pa gsungs pa /
translated: The purpose of the ma·πá·∏çala is stated:

original: der ni rig ma bzang mo rnam par gzhug / ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: der ni rig ma bzang mo rnam par gzhug / ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: One should install the excellent knowledge-consorts there, and so on.

original: yang na ji ltar gang rnyed de //
analyzed: yang na ji ltar gang rnyed de //
translated: Or else, how is it that one finds it?

original: zhes bya ba ni rigs lnga'i dngos po med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rigs lnga'i dngos po med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the five clans are non-existent.

original: phyag rgya'i dgos pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: phyag rgya'i dgos pa gsungs pa /

original: de srid bsten par bya zhes bya ba @28a * //
analyzed: de srid bsten par bya zhes bya ba @28a * //
translated: One should rely on it as long as...

original: la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: la sogs pa'o //
translated: and so forth.

original: bsten pa'i dgos pa yang gsungs pa //
analyzed: bsten pa'i dgos pa yang gsungs pa //
translated: The purpose of reliance is also stated:

original: slob ma'i khar ni btung bar bya //
analyzed: slob ma'i khar ni btung bar bya //
translated: One should drink it in the mouth of the disciple.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: and so forth.

original: 'dis ni slob dpon dang gsang ba'i dbang gi mthar /
analyzed: 'dis ni slob dpon dang gsang ba'i dbang gi mthar /
translated: By this, the master and the secret initiation,

original: de nyid la ni bya bar bya //
analyzed: de nyid la ni bya bar bya //
translated: One should do it on that very day.

original: zhes bya ba ni gsum pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gsum pa'o //
translated: This is the third.

original: rang rig ces bya ba la sogs pa ni bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: rang rig ces bya ba la sogs pa ni bzhi pa'o //
