original: 'dis ni 'dir dbang rnams kyi phyogs tsam zhig bstan te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'dir dbang rnams kyi phyogs tsam zhig bstan te /
translated: By this, here the initiations are taught in part.

original: de bas na de don du gnyer ba rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi thabs legs par bsdu ba nyid 'dir btsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na de don du gnyer ba rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi thabs legs par bsdu ba nyid 'dir btsal bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, those who seek this should seek it here in the excellent collection of the mandala methods.

original: de yang rim pa las ma 'das par gzhung nyung du ma yin zhing rgyas par dbang bzhi po rnams rab tu bstan to //
analyzed: de yang rim pa las ma 'das par gzhung nyung du ma yin zhing rgyas par dbang bzhi po rnams rab tu bstan to //
translated: Moreover, not exceeding the stages, the four initiations are well taught in the extensive and not brief text.

original: 'dir yang brtag pa gnyis pa'i le'u bcu gnyis par rim pa tsam sbyor bar mdzad de /üîΩrdo rje rab gnas rdo rje ni /
analyzed: 'dir yang brtag pa gnyis pa'i le'u bcu gnyis par rim pa tsam sbyor bar mdzad de / rdo rje rab gnas rdo rje ni /
translated: Here also, in the twelfth chapter of the second examination, the sequence is applied.üîΩThe four verses of the initiation are stated, beginning with:üîΩThe great vajra consecration,

original: che dang dril bu chen po gzung //üîΩzhes bya ba la sogs pas dbang gi tshigs bcad bzhi po rnams gsungs so //
analyzed: che dang dril bu chen po gzung // zhes bya ba la sogs pas dbang gi tshigs bcad bzhi po rnams gsungs so //
translated: holding the great vajra and bell.

original: yang kha cig glegs bam gyi stobs kyis bye brag mi shes pas ji ltar res 'ga' gzhung dang mthun pa'i don gyis dga' ba rnams kyi bzlog pa'i rim pa ma byed cig nges par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: yang kha cig glegs bam gyi stobs kyis bye brag mi shes pas ji ltar res 'ga' gzhung dang mthun pa'i don gyis dga' ba rnams kyi bzlog pa'i rim pa ma byed cig nges par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Again, some, not knowing the distinctions due to the power of the scriptures, sometimes do not perform the reversal sequence of the joys that accord with the text. In order to definitely do so,üîΩit is stated:

original: dang por dga' ba tsam nyid de //üîΩzhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dang por dga' ba tsam nyid de // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: First, there is just joy.

original: dang po zhes bya ba ni rnam par dbye ba med par 'di bstan pa'o //
analyzed: dang po zhes bya ba ni rnam par dbye ba med par 'di bstan pa'o //
translated: Here, ‚Äúfirst‚Äù means that this is taught without differentiation.

original: dga' ba ni mchog tu dga' ba dang rangs pa thob pa'i yid do //
analyzed: dga' ba ni mchog tu dga' ba dang rangs pa thob pa'i yid do //
translated: ‚ÄúJoy‚Äù is the mind that obtains supreme joy and delight.

original: de yang mchog ma yin pa dang / mchog dang ches mchog dang / che ba las ches mchog gi dbye bas bzhir dbye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang mchog ma yin pa dang / mchog dang ches mchog dang / che ba las ches mchog gi dbye bas bzhir dbye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, it is divided into four types: the inferior, the superior, the most superior, and the greater than the greatest.

original: de bas na de nyid kyi go rims bzhin du /
analyzed: de bas na de nyid kyi go rims bzhin du /
translated: Therefore, in the same order,

original: thu bo dang / rjes su skyes pa dang / 'bring po dang / tha chungs kyi dga' ba rtogs par bya ba dang / thu bo ni dang po dang / mchog ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: thu bo dang / rjes su skyes pa dang / 'bring po dang / tha chungs kyi dga' ba rtogs par bya ba dang / thu bo ni dang po dang / mchog ma yin pa'o //
translated: one should understand the joy of the elder, the joy of the younger, the joy of the middle, and the joy of the youngest. The joy of the elder is the first, and it is inferior.

original: rjes su skyes pa ni mchog dang gnyis pa dang mchog go //
analyzed: rjes su skyes pa ni mchog dang gnyis pa dang mchog go //
translated: The joy of the younger is the second, and it is superior.

original: 'bring po ni gsum pa dang / ches mchog dang dga' bral lo //
analyzed: 'bring po ni gsum pa dang / ches mchog dang dga' bral lo //
translated: The joy of the middle is the third, and it is the most superior, and it is the joy of separation.

original: tha chungs ni bzhi pa dang che ba las ches mchog dang lhan cig skyes pa'o //
analyzed: tha chungs ni bzhi pa dang che ba las ches mchog dang lhan cig skyes pa'o //
translated: The joy of the youngest is the fourth, and it is the greater than the greatest, and it is the innate.

original: skad cig ma rnams kyis kyang rnam pa sna tshogs pa la sogs pa rnams kyis 'di nyid rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: skad cig ma rnams kyis kyang rnam pa sna tshogs pa la sogs pa rnams kyis 'di nyid rtogs par bya'o //
translated: One should understand this through the various moments, etc.

original: gzhan du na yang 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / skad cig ma dang / dbang la sogs pa 'khrugs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan du na yang 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / skad cig ma dang / dbang la sogs pa 'khrugs par 'gyur te /
translated: Otherwise, there would be a confusion of the noble truths, moments, and the masteries, etc.

original: de 'khrugs pa'i phyir sgrub thabs yongs su mi shes pas /
analyzed: de 'khrugs pa'i phyir sgrub thabs yongs su mi shes pas /
translated: Because of that disturbance, one does not fully understand the means of accomplishment.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i @28b dngos grub gang //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i @28b dngos grub gang //
translated: What is the spiritual power to be accomplished?

original: zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
translated: This is the thought.

original: bsgom par bya ba dang / sgom pa po dang / sgom pa la sogs pa rnams kyis ma reg pa dang / rlom sems med pa dang / rtog pa'i rlabs med par nyung du ma yin par sngags pa lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu rtogs pa dang /
analyzed: bsgom par bya ba dang / sgom pa po dang / sgom pa la sogs pa rnams kyis ma reg pa dang / rlom sems med pa dang / rtog pa'i rlabs med par nyung du ma yin par sngags pa lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu rtogs pa dang /
translated: Not touched by the object of meditation, the meditator, meditation, and so forth, without pride, without waves of thought, not little, the mantra practitioner realizes the cause of the connate,

original: 'bras bu mi 'dra bar mthong nas rdo rje snyid pos zhus pa /
analyzed: 'bras bu mi 'dra bar mthong nas rdo rje snyid pos zhus pa /
translated: and seeing the result as different, Vajrapani asked:

original: kye bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'byung ba chen po las gyur pa'i phung po lags zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gzod ma nas rang bzhin med pa'i chos lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin can ni dag pa'i lus te phung po las gzhan ma yin pa'i
analyzed: kye bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'byung ba chen po las gyur pa'i phung po lags zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gzod ma nas rang bzhin med pa'i chos lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin can ni dag pa'i lus te phung po las gzhan ma yin pa'i
translated: Why is the aggregate that arises from the great elements called an aggregate? and so on. The connate nature of phenomena, primordially without inherent nature, is the pure body, not other than the aggregates.

original: phyir phung po'o //
analyzed: phyir phung po'o //
translated: Therefore, it is the aggregates.

original: ji ltar 'byung ba las gyur pa ni 'byung ba lnga po rnams kyis byas pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar 'byung ba las gyur pa ni 'byung ba lnga po rnams kyis byas pa'o //
translated: As for the ‚Äúelemental,‚Äù it is created by the five elements.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlab pa'i lan btab pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlab pa'i lan btab pa /
translated: Then the Blessed One replied with the blessing of the elements:

original: bo la kakko lar sbyor bas //
analyzed: bo la kakko lar sbyor bas //
translated: ‚ÄúThe union of bola and kakkola,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /üîΩbo la dang kakko lar mngon par sbyor ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / bo la dang kakko lar mngon par sbyor ba ni /
translated: etc.

original: bo la kakko lar sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: bo la kakko lar sbyor ba'o //
translated: The ‚Äúunion of bola and kakkola‚Äù is the union of the bola and kakkola.

original: de bas na khams rnams skye bar 'gyur ro //üîΩlnga po rnams kyis yongs su bskor //
analyzed: de bas na khams rnams skye bar 'gyur ro // lnga po rnams kyis yongs su bskor //
translated: Thus the elements are born.

original: zhes bya ba ni sa la sogs pa lnga po de rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste lhan cig skyes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sa la sogs pa lnga po de rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste lhan cig skyes pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSurrounded by the five‚Äù means that the five, earth, etc., are the blessing, the co-emergent.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: de yi bde ba de nyid min //
analyzed: de yi bde ba de nyid min //
translated: ‚ÄúThat bliss is not reality itself.‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de'i phyir gal te 'di skad du 'byung ba chen po lnga'i bdag nyid can gyi bde ba lhan cig skyes pa 'di ni de'i tshe de kho na nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gal te 'di skad du 'byung ba chen po lnga'i bdag nyid can gyi bde ba lhan cig skyes pa 'di ni de'i tshe de kho na nyid ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, if this co-emergent bliss, which has the nature of the five great elements, is not reality itself,

original: 'on kyang 'dir khams rnams 'bras bur gyur pa rnams kyi skyed pa po rgyu ma byung ba'i phyir 'byung ba nyid yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'dir khams rnams 'bras bur gyur pa rnams kyi skyed pa po rgyu ma byung ba'i phyir 'byung ba nyid yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But here, since the cause of the generation of the elements that are the effect does not exist, the origination of the elements does not exist.

original: de'i phyir gang las de byin gyis brlab /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang las de byin gyis brlab /
translated: Therefore, what is consecrated by what?üîΩWhat is the true nature of pleasure?

original: gang gis bde ba de kho na nyid ma yin zhes rgol ba'i lan legs par btab pa de la de nyid spyad par bya ste /
analyzed: gang gis bde ba de kho na nyid ma yin zhes rgol ba'i lan legs par btab pa de la de nyid spyad par bya ste /
translated: The response to this objection is well taken.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu'i tshogs pa 'di re zhig gsungs nas 'bras bu'i rgyu la'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ba de ni btsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu'i tshogs pa 'di re zhig gsungs nas 'bras bu'i rgyu la'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ba de ni btsal bar bya'o //
translated: The Blessed One, after teaching the collection of co-operating causes, also taught the cause of the effect.

original: kakko lar grags pa'i g-yon dang g-yas pa'i ngos su rtsa gnyis gnas pa de dag la gcig ni khu ba dang / gzhan du khrag 'bab pa na de dag 'du ba ste khams bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: kakko lar grags pa'i g-yon dang g-yas pa'i ngos su rtsa gnyis gnas pa de dag la gcig ni khu ba dang / gzhan du khrag 'bab pa na de dag 'du ba ste khams bsdu ba'o //
translated: The two channels, known as the right and left channels, are located on the right and left sides of the kakkola. One of them carries semen and the other carries blood. Their union is the union of the elements.

original: de ni 'di gsum ste /
analyzed: de ni 'di gsum ste /
translated: That is this triad:

original: snying stobs dang rngul dang mun pa'o //
analyzed: snying stobs dang rngul dang mun pa'o //
translated: sattva, rajas, and tamas.

original: bo la kakko sbyor bas /
analyzed: bo la kakko sbyor bas /
translated: By uniting the bola and kakkola,

original: 'di rnams kyi ro mnyam pa nyid kyi dngos po 'byung ba lnga'i bdag @29a * //
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi ro mnyam pa nyid kyi dngos po 'byung ba lnga'i bdag @29a * //
translated: The entity of the equality of their tastes is the aggregate of the five elements.

original: nyid can gyi gong bu de las phung po ste de yang rdo rje can no //
analyzed: nyid can gyi gong bu de las phung po ste de yang rdo rje can no //
translated: From that, the aggregate is the vajra holder.

original: yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang gsungs pa /
translated: It is also said:

original: skye gnas dbus su rtsa gnyis dag //
analyzed: skye gnas dbus su rtsa gnyis dag //
translated: In the middle of the birthplace, there are two channels,

original: g-yon dang g-yas pa la ni gnas //
analyzed: g-yon dang g-yas pa la ni gnas //
translated: located on the left and right.

original: g-yon du khu ba rnam shes bya //
analyzed: g-yon du khu ba rnam shes bya //
translated: On the left, it is the semen, consciousness.

original: g-yas pa la yang khrag nyid de //
analyzed: g-yas pa la yang khrag nyid de //
translated: On the right, it is blood.

original: gnyis kyi 'du ba gang zhig ni //
analyzed: gnyis kyi 'du ba gang zhig ni //
translated: The union of the two

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi sdud pa nyid //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi sdud pa nyid //
translated: is the gathering of the dharmadhatu.

original: snying stobs sku dang 'dod chags rngul //
analyzed: snying stobs sku dang 'dod chags rngul //
translated: Sattva is the body, and passion is the sap.

original: mun pa sems kyi rang bzhin las //
analyzed: mun pa sems kyi rang bzhin las //
translated: From the nature of the mind, which is darkness,

original: rdo rje padma mnyam sbyor bas //
analyzed: rdo rje padma mnyam sbyor bas //
translated: the vajra and lotus are united.

original: mnyam pa nyid du 'ongs pa ni //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid du 'ongs pa ni //
translated: The coming of equality

original: gong bu'i rang bzhin bdud rtsi lnga //
analyzed: gong bu'i rang bzhin bdud rtsi lnga //
translated: is the five nectars, the nature of the aggregate.

original: de phyir rdo rje can du brjod //
analyzed: de phyir rdo rje can du brjod //
translated: Therefore, it is called the vajra holder.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: And so on.

original: gal te de ltar na de'i tshe lhan cig skyes pa 'di'i don gang zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar na de'i tshe lhan cig skyes pa 'di'i don gang zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then what is the meaning of connate at that time?

original: lhan cig skyes pas gang skyes pa //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pas gang skyes pa //
translated: Whatever is born from the connate

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: lhan cig skyes pa 'di ni lhan cig skye ba'i phyir phan tshun du rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur pa ste khu ba dang / dga' bdag go //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa 'di ni lhan cig skye ba'i phyir phan tshun du rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur pa ste khu ba dang / dga' bdag go //
translated: This innate is mutually causal, because it is innate, like semen and pleasure.

original: lhan cig skyes pas zhes bya ba ni de dag gis te /
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pas zhes bya ba ni de dag gis te /
translated: By the innate, it is said, they are innate.

original: lhan cig skyes pa la'am de dag la'o //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa la'am de dag la'o //
translated: In the innate, or in them.

original: gang zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir ro //
analyzed: gang zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir ro //
translated: That which is said is the reason.

original: skyes pa ni skye ba ste lhan cig skyes pa'o //
analyzed: skyes pa ni skye ba ste lhan cig skyes pa'o //
translated: Born means born, innate.

original: de las skye ba'i phyir mi rigs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to /
analyzed: de las skye ba'i phyir mi rigs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to /
translated: Because it is born from that, it is not unreasonable, is the meaning.

original: re zhig rigs pa 'di ni gsungs na gzhan du yang ji ltar lhan cig skyes par brjod ces dogs pa la /
analyzed: re zhig rigs pa 'di ni gsungs na gzhan du yang ji ltar lhan cig skyes par brjod ces dogs pa la /
translated: If this reasoning is stated, then how is it said to be innate in another way?

original: rang bzhin lhan cig skyes zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rang bzhin lhan cig skyes zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The intrinsic nature is innate, etc. is stated.

original: lhan cig skyes pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad kyi rang gi ngo bo gcig pa dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi sdom pa gcig pa'o //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad kyi rang gi ngo bo gcig pa dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi sdom pa gcig pa'o //
translated: This innate is the single intrinsic nature of all aspects, and the single restraint of all aspects.

original: de'i tshe rnal 'byor pa ji lta bu zhes dogs pa la //
analyzed: de'i tshe rnal 'byor pa ji lta bu zhes dogs pa la //
translated: At that time, what kind of yogi is it?
